K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:152b-1: a'arya mee tri ya ma h'a sing ha n'a da na n'a ma ma h'a ya na s'u tra /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:152b-3: 'phags pa byams pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:152b-5: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:152b-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:153a-1: 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:153a-2: dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:153a-9: mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:153a-10: de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:153a-11: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:153a-12: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:153a-13: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:153a-14: gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:153a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:153a-16: bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:153a-17: de skad ces gsol pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:153b-8: ji ltar rnal 'byor du bgyi lags /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:153b-15: skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:153b-16: 'jig rten la rjes su snying brtse ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:153b-17: lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:153b-18: skye bo phal po che'i don dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:153b-19: phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:153b-22: de'i phyir khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:153b-23: ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:153b-24: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:153b-26: de bzhin no zhes gsol te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:153b-27: bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:153b-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:154a-3: so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:154a-4: cho ga phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:154a-5: spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:154a-6: kha na ma tho ba phra rab tsam dag la yang 'jigs par lta ba dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:154a-13: rnyed pas rnyed par byed 'dod pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:154a-14: ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:154a-15: khrel yod pa dang ldan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:154a-17: 'khor ba la yid skrag pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:154a-18: nges par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:154a-19: nges par 'byung ba la mngon par brtson pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:154a-20: 'khor ba la rtag tu yid skyo ba dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:154b-0: skyes bu 'dul @154b pa'i kha lo sgyur ba /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:154b-9: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis dpag tu med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:154b-10: yon tan gyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:154b-12: tshad med pa dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:154b-15: ji skad gsung ba de bzhin du mdzad pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:154b-20: ma gsol bar bshes gnyen mdzad pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:154b-22: ded dpon chen po yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:154b-23: de ni chos mya ngan las 'das pa zab pa zab par snang ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:154b-24: zhi ba zhi bar ston pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:154b-29: mtshan ma yang dag par chad pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:154b-43: rgyu yang dag par chad pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:155a-5: sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:155a-6: sred pa yang dag par chad pa ston par mdzad pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:155a-7: yang dag par ston par mdzad pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:155a-8: zhes rnam pa las yid la bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:155a-10: de la dge slong gcig pu dben par song ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:155a-11: nang du yang dag par 'jog pa la zhugs pas ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:155a-12: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa las yid la bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:155a-13: bdag gis mi'i lus thob cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:155a-15: bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po yang thob; bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa yang mnyes par byas pas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:155a-16: bdag le lo byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:155a-17: bya ba sna tshogs kyi 'du 'dzis g-yen spyo zhing gnas pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:155a-20: bdag la 'bras bu ma thob pa kho nar 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de lta bu yang yod la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:155a-21: sangs rgyas bcom ldan rnams ni 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:155a-23: au dum wa ra'i me tog ltar brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:155a-24: de lta na bdag gis da ltar byung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:155a-25: ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa las yid la bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:155a-27: de la dge slong gis ni khyod dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:155b-0: gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi @155b rjes su bslab par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:155b-2: 'di ltar khyod nga ma mthong ma thos par 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs pa de dag gi rjes su slob pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:155b-4: 'od srung khyod chos 'dul ba 'di nyid la mdzes par gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:155b-5: gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du mthong zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:155b-6: mthong nas kyang nye bar 'ongs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:155b-8: bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gsol bar byed pa de dag gi rab tu 'byung ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:155b-9: de'i 'og tu yang de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su mkhyen to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:155b-10: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos don gyi dbang gnyis mthong bas ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung bar khas blang bar bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:155b-11: gnyis gang zhe na; tshe 'di la 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:155b-12: ma 'ongs pa na bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos mthong ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:155b-14: de la skyes bu blun po kha cig de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar gos dur smrig dag bgos shing rab tu 'byung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:155b-15: bsnyen par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos por khas blangs te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:156a-3: chos gos kyi rnam par rtog pa dag dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:156a-9: rnam par mi rtogs so snyam du yang sems so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:156a-11: gang gi tshe dge slong gnas khang na 'dug kyang rung /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:156a-15: gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dag gam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:156a-16: rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag gam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:156a-17: mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:156a-18: rnam par rtog par byed pa de'i tshe /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:156a-22: lha gang dag gnyug ma gnyug mar gnas pa de dag gis dge slong de'i sems sems kyis shes nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:156a-23: de dag 'di snyam du dge slong 'di gang gi phyir legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:156a-24: sdig pa mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa de lta bu dag la rnam par rtog par byed pa ni mi rigs so snyam nas yid ma rangs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:156a-26: yid mi bde bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:156a-28: de la lha de dag las kha cig ni skul bar yang byed la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:156a-29: kha cig gis ni snod ma yin par rig nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:156b-0: @156b khyad du bsad de 'khod par yang byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:156b-2: dge ba'i rtsa ba chung du dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:156b-3: shes pa chung du dang ldan pa'i lha de dag gis kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:156b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:156b-6: legs par spyod pa spyad pas lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:156b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mkhyen pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:156b-11: mngon sum du ma mdzad pa ci yang mi mnga' ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:156b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'das pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:156b-16: dus las rnam par grol ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:156b-17: brjod par mi bya ba'i shes bya rnam pa lnga la ye shes thogs pa med pa dang ldan zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:156b-18: the tshom dang bral ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:156b-20: de lta bas na rigs kyi bu'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:156b-21: rigs kyi bu mo legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:156b-22: bdag nyid rang la rag lus par shes nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:156b-23: de bzhin gshegs pas kyang bdag gi sems thugs kyis mkhyen la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:156b-24: gang dag phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:156b-25: 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:156b-26: bdag gi sems thugs kyis mkhyen pas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:156b-27: bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:156b-28: dge sbyong gi chom rkun mi bya'o zhes bslab par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:157a-0: @157a *// de la dge sbyong gi chom rkun gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:157a-1: bzhi po 'di dag ni dge sbyong gi chom rkun yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:157a-4: 'di la dge slong dge sbyong gi kha dog dang; rtags dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:157a-6: de yang tshul khrims 'chal ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:157a-7: sdig pa'i chos can yin par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:157a-8: de ni dge sbyong gi chom rkun dang po yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:157a-9: dben pa'i gnas su song ste gnas pa ni mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag la rnam par rtog pa byed na de ni dge sbyong gi chom rkun gnyis pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:157a-10: bdag nyid 'bras bu ma thob cing so so'i skye bo yin par shes bzhin du rnyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:157a-12: tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pas zil gyis non pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:157a-13: gzhan dag gi mdun du bdag nyid dgra bcom pa yin par khas 'che bar byed na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:157a-14: de ni dge sbyong gi chom rkun gsum pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:157a-15: bdag la bstod cing gzhan la smod par byed na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:157a-16: de ni dge sbyong gi chom rkun bzhi pa yin te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:157a-24: stobs chen po'i shugs dang ldan pa gang la la zhig byung bar gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:157a-26: skyes bu des 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi gang ji snyed pa rnams dbyug pas brdegs sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:157b-0: pham par byas nas nye bar spyod pa'i @157b longs spyod 'gron bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:157b-10: rin po che sna tshogs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:157b-11: khang khyim dang; bzhon pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:157b-16: stan gyi nye bar spyad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:157b-19: rtse ba'i longs spyod ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bcom zhing phrogs te khyer bar gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:157b-22: gzhi de las mi de bsod nams ma yin pa mang du bskyed snyam mam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:157b-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:157b-30: khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste; gang zhig bdag nyid 'bras bu ma thob cing so so'i skye bo yin par shes bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:157b-33: tshigs su bcad pas 'dod pas zil gyis non pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:157b-34: gzhan dag gi mdun du bdag nyid rgyun du zhugs pa yin par khas 'che bar byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:157b-35: tha na bsod snyoms gcig tsam yongs su longs spyod par byed na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:157b-36: de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mang du bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:157b-37: de ni de bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po mi bzad pa bskyed pa yin no //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:163a-22: gzhan yang khyod phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha mal dam pa'i chos bsrung bar spro'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:163b-0: sems can bsam pa dge ba gang dag khyod kyis bshad pa la gus @163b par nyan pa bskyed par 'gyur ba dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:163b-1: de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:163b-2: bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:163b-4: bdag gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams grong dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:163b-7: brag dang ri bo'i zom dang bcas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:163b-10: nags tshal dang bcas pa 'di bskal pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:163b-11: bskal pa las lhag par phrag pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:163b-12: spyi bo la 'tshal bar ni spro lags kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:163b-14: bdag skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag gi log par smra ba'i sug las de dag nyan par ni mi spro lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:163b-19: bskal pa las lhag par 'tsho ba ni spro lags kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:163b-21: skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag gi log par smra ba'i sug las de dag nyan par ni mi spro lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:163b-23: bdag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bskal pa'i zhugs chen po 'bar /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:163b-25: kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar bar gyur pa'i nang du spyod lam bzhi po dag gis dgung lo bye ba snyad du gnas par ni spro lags kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:163b-27: bdag skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag gi log par spro ba'i sug las de dag nyan par ni mi spro lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164a-2: bdag sems can thams cad las khro ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164a-7: brdeg btsog dag bzod pas dang du len par ni spro lags kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164a-12: chos la mu cor smra ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164a-13: chos ltar bcos pa ston pa de dag gi log par smra ba'i sug las de dag nyan par ni mi spro lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164a-15: bdag ni nye tshe bar spyod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164a-16: nye tshe ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa lags pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164a-17: de lta bu'i khur 'degs pa'i rngo mi thogs lags kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164a-19: byang chub sems dpa' ni de lta bu'i khur 'degs par rngo thogs lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164a-21: gzhan yang 'di la bdag dper brjod par spobs lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164a-25: mi la la zhig rgas shing gtugs la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164a-27: de yang na tshod dgung lo brgya nyi shu tsam lags par gyur la; mi de bro nad kyis thebs shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164a-29: mchis mal gyi khri steng du mchis /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164a-31: mi shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can phyug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164a-33: longs spyod che ba la la zhig der mchis nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164a-34: mi mchis mal gyi khri steng na mchis nyal ba de la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164a-35: kye skyes bu kho bo'i gter 'di khyod la gdams kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164b-0: kho bo gang gi tshe lo bcu'am nyi shu tsam na @164b yul gzhan nas phyir 'ong ba de'i tshe /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164b-1: khyod kyis kho bo la gter 'di phyir byin cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164b-2: ces de'i sug par gter 'doms par bgyid cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164b-4: yul gzhan du mchis par gyur la; mi mchis mal gyi khri steng na mchis nyal ba de la yang bu yang ma mchis /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164b-7: de nas mi de yul gzhan du mchis nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164b-8: ring po ma lags par de yang 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164b-9: nor gyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyang chab 'tshal bar gyur pa'i slad na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164b-10: mi de slar mchis na su la ji skad bgyir yang ma mchis pa de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164b-12: gang zhig nyan thos nyi tshe bar spyod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164b-13: nyi tshe ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa zla bo ma mchis pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164b-14: yun ring por mi gnas pa la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164b-15: dam pa'i chos kyi gter 'doms par bgyid na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164b-16: de yang yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur bar 'tshal bar bgyi lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164b-20: ngas kyang de ltar shes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164b-21: 'on kyang khyod las dpe'i spobs pa de lta bu thos na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164b-22: skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag kun du skyo ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur pas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164b-23: ngas shes bzhin du khyed la dris pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164b-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:164b-26: 'di la bdag dpe gnyis pa brjod par yang spobs lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165a-1: pa'i rang bzhin can bro nad dang bral ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165a-2: dgung lo 'bum phrag du mar 'tsho ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165a-3: gzhon nu thor bu lang tsho la bab pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165a-5: longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165a-11: yid dga' ba dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165a-12: sems can gyi skyon dang nyon mongs pa'i skyon rnams la btang snyoms su 'jog pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165a-13: skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165a-14: skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165a-15: 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165a-16: lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang; skye bo phal po che'i don dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165a-17: sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du zhugs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165a-18: rtul ba brtan pa la la zhig mchis par gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165a-19: skyes bu dam pa de'i gan du mi la la zhig mchis nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165a-20: 'di skad ces kye skyes bu kho bo'i gter 'di khyod la gdams kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165a-21: khyod kyis gter 'di legs par spa ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165a-22: legs par bsrung bar gyis shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165a-23: kho bo gang gi tshe lo bcu'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165a-24: nyi shu tsam na yul gzhan nas phyir 'ong ba de'i tshe /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165a-25: khyod kyis gter 'di kho bo la phyir byin ces smras te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165a-26: de'i sug par gter de gtams na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165a-27: mi de ni gter de blangs nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165a-30: mi de slar mchis nas kyang gter de slar stsol bar bgyid pa de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165b-0: gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' la dam pa'i chos kyi @165b gter 'doms par bgyid na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165b-1: de ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang por yang cha ba 'tshal bar mi 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165b-2: skye bo mang po la yang sman thogs par 'gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165b-3: sangs rgyas kyi gdung dang; chos kyi gdung dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165b-4: dge 'dun gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par yang 'gyur lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165b-6: bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' gang yongs su bsgrub par bgyid pa'i bgyi ba de dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165b-7: don de yongs su sgrub par rngo mi thogs lags kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165b-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di 'khor 'di nyid du 'dus te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di la bka' stsol cig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165b-13: slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus kyi tshe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165b-14: de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa bye ba grangs ma mchis par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di 'dzin par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165b-15: rgyas par bgyid par 'gyur lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:165b-18: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lags pa'i slad du ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166a-0: rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i bu @166a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166a-1: thu bo gang lags pa de ni rgyal po'i 'og tu rgyal srid bgyid du stsol bar 'gyur lags pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166a-2: de ni rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de nyid mchis bzhin du yang rgyal srid la spro bar bgyid cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166a-3: chos dang ldan par yang 'gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166a-4: de 'di snyam du yang sems lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166a-5: rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba 'di'i 'og tu ni bdag gis rgyal po bgyi'o snyam nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166a-7: 'di ltar rgyal po'i bgyi ba gang dag lags pa de dag la yang mngon par brtson par bgyid pa de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166a-8: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166a-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di yang 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166a-10: dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal srid chen po bgyid du stsol bar 'gyur ba lags pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166a-11: 'dis ni dam pa'i chos kun du bsrung ba la mngon par brtson par bgyi 'tshal lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166a-12: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166a-16: ji skad smras pa de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g-yas pa gser gyi mdog can brkyang nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166a-18: bskal pa bye ba grangs med par dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i phyag 'jam pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166b-1: ka tsa li na di ka ltar reg na bde ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166b-2: rgya skyegs kyi khu bas bsgos pa'i mdog 'dra ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166b-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i mgo bor bzhag ste byugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166b-4: byams pa khyod phyi ma'i tshe /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166b-5: phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166b-6: dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166b-7: dam pa'i chos kun tu bsrung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166b-8: yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166b-12: dge 'dun gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir spro bar gyis shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i spyi bor phyag g-yas pa gser gyi mdog can bzhag ma thag tu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166b-14: de nas skad cig de nyid la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lan gsum du rab tu g-yos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166b-22: kun tu rab tu ldeg cing; 'jig rten du snang ba chen po yang byung bar gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166b-24: bar snang la gnas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166b-25: 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis kyang thal mo sbyar te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166b-26: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166b-27: 'phags pa byams pa khyod skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166b-28: skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:166b-29: 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167a-0: lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don @167a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167a-2: sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du dam pa'i chos kun du bsrung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167a-3: yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167a-4: yongs su gzung bar spro bar mdzod cig ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167a-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa stan las langs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167a-6: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167a-7: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167a-8: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167a-10: bdag ni sems can gcig gi don gyi slad du yang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167a-11: slad ma'i mtha'i mu'i bar du 'khor ba na 'khor ba yang spro lags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167a-12: dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167a-14: bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa bye ba grangs ma mchis par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di kun du bsrung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167a-15: rgyas par bgyi lags so; ;byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs ma thag tu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167a-16: de nas yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g-yos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167b-0: bdag ni @167b su la yang 'gran par mi bgyid /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167b-1: nga rgyal mi bgyid lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167b-5: dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba 'di dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167b-6: skyes bu dam pa'i sug las lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167b-8: byang chub sems dpas khur gang 'degs par bgyid pa'i khur de lta bu de ni nyan thos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167b-9: rang sangs rgyas kyis 'degs par rngo mi thogs pa'i slad du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167b-13: ji ltar nga'i spyan snga na khyod dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir seng ge'i sgra 'di ltar sgrogs par byed pa de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167b-14: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi spyan snga dag na yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167b-15: dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167b-16: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167b-17: bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167b-19: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167b-20: byang chub sems dpar mchid kyis 'che ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167b-21: dge sbyong du mchid kyis 'che ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167b-22: glen pa blun po rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'tshal ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167b-23: rnyed pa dang bkur sti la gdub /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167b-24: mdza' bshes kyi sdum pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:167b-25: slong mo ster ba'i sdum pa la gdub /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168a-1: snyoms la sbyor bar brtson pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168a-2: de dag gi nongs pa'i gnas bdag la bka' stsal du gsol /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168a-3: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168a-5: 'di ltar bdag gis rgyu de dag thos nas de dag rtogs pas myur ba myur bar spong bar bgyid cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168a-6: nongs ba de dag las bdag nyid bsrung bar bgyid pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168a-7: skyes bu dam bam lags pa de dag las kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168a-8: la la de bzhin gshegs pas bdag mkhyen cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168a-9: de bzhin gshegs pas bdag rtogs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168a-10: rab tu rtogs so zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la dang ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168a-11: de skad ces gsol ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168a-14: de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168a-15: skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag gi nyes pa'i gnas gang yin pa cung zad tsam zhig bstan par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168a-17: de la phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la; byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba mang po 'byung ba de dag gi sdig pa 'dod pa gang dag yin pa de dag bshad par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168a-19: byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168a-20: byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba yin par rig par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168b-0: yang ba'i 'tsho bas 'tsho @168b par byed pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168b-2: byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168b-3: byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba yin par rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168b-5: de la phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168b-6: byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168b-7: khyi'i chos kun du spyod pa mang po dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168b-11: khyi ni sngon lan 'ga' phyin pa'i khyim gzhan zhig tu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168b-12: khyi gzhan zhig rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168b-13: khyim 'di ni bdag gi yin no snyam nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168b-17: gnod sems kyi nyes pa skyed par byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168b-18: gzhan gyi khyim bdag gir byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168b-19: bdag gi yin par 'du shes skyed par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168b-21: de bzhin du phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya ba tha ma la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168b-22: byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168b-23: khyi'i chos kun tu spyod pa mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang gzhan gyi khyim dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168b-24: gzhan gyi grong dag la bdag nyid kyi yin par 'du shes skyed par byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168b-25: bdag nyid kyi yin par 'du shes bskyed nas kyang yongs su 'dzin par byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168b-26: dge slong des sngon phyin pa'i khyim der /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168b-27: dge slong gzhan zhig 'ong ba mthong na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:168b-28: de khyim 'di ni bdag gi yin no snyam nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169a-2: tshig rtsub po brjod par byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169a-3: gcig la gcig dge slong che ge mo zhes bya ba la nyes pa 'di lta bu yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169a-4: dge slong mche ge mo zhes bya ba la nyes pa 'di lta bu yod do zhes mi snyan par rjod par byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169a-5: khyim bdag la yang gal te khyod kho po dang bsten par 'dod na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169a-6: dge slong che ge mo zhig dang bsten par mi bya zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169a-7: dge slong ma che ge mo zhig dang yang ma bsten cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169a-9: de dag ni skyugs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba ring du mig gnas par smad par bya ba'i kha zas tsam gyi phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169a-10: bsod nams ma yin pa mang po bskyed pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169a-11: de dag ni yi dvags kyi yon tan gyi chos kun du spyod cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169a-14: ser sna dang ldan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169a-15: bdag nyid gso bar byed pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169a-16: byang chub sems dpa'i ming gis byang chub sems dpa' yin par khas 'che bar byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169a-17: bdag nyid tshul khrims 'chal ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169a-18: sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169a-19: sdig pa kun du spyod pa yin bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169a-20: sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169a-21: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi bsngags pa yang brjod cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169a-22: byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169a-23: gzhan dag gi bsngags pa yang brjod nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169a-24: zas dang gos sgrub par yang byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169a-26: 'di ltar seng ge'i sgra bsgrag cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169b-0: seng ge'i las rnams @169b bya ba'i rigs pa wa'i sgra bsgrag cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169b-1: wa'i las rnams byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169b-2: bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i bsngags par byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169b-3: 'jig rten gyi zang zing yun mi ring par yongs su gtong bar mi byed la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169b-4: ser snas zil gyis gnon cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169b-5: yo byad kyi dri mas spags pa de dag gis gtong ba phyi rol du byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169b-6: phan pa'i dngos po'i bsngags pa rjod par byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169b-9: khong khro ba'i nyes pa mang po byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169b-10: bzod pa'i bsngags brjod par byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169b-11: gcig tu gnod sems kyi sems su byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169b-12: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag gi bsngags brjod par byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169b-16: don mthun pas sdud par mi byed pa de dag ji tsam du mi bzad par 'gyur ba la ltos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169b-17: de dag ni tshig tsam gyi dngos por 'gyur ba yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169b-18: de dag yon tan yang dag par blang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169b-19: 'dres pa'i spyod pas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus la mos pa'i rjes su slob par byed pa ni ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169b-21: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169b-22: bskal pa grangs med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169b-24: ches shin tu grangs med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169b-27: bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:169b-28: dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes bla ma @170a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170a-2: rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170a-5: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170a-6: bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170a-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shig 'jig rten du byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa de yang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170a-12: da ltar nga bzhin du snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa kho na'i 'jig rten du byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170a-14: de'i tshe na dge slong brtson 'grus mos zhes bya ba dran pa dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170a-17: 'dod pa chung ba chog shes pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la nan tan byed pa zhig byung bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170a-23: yul 'khor de dag tu song ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170a-24: phyin ba dang chos ston par byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170a-26: blon po chen po dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170a-27: skye bo phal po che gzhan dag gis kyang rin mo byas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170a-32: yongs su shes par byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170a-33: de khyim gang du zhugs shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170a-34: gang las tshig snyam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170a-35: bdag la gus par nyan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170a-37: btung ba thob par 'gyur ba'i khyim der ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170a-38: de lan gnyis su 'gro bar sems bskyed par mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170a-41: log par lta ba dang ldan pa'i khyim gzhan dag tu song zhing de dag tu son pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170b-0: de la de @170b dag 'ongs pa legs so zhes kyang mi zer /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170b-1: de dag tshig snyam par yang mi brjod pa'i steng du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170b-4: de bzod pa'i go bgos shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170b-5: snying rje chen po la gnas pas 'gro la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170b-6: khyim de dag tu yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170b-7: yid mi bde bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170b-9: byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos des /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170b-10: khyim gang dag dad par byas ba de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170b-17: yo byad dag gis dge slong gzhan dag gi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170b-20: de khyim de dag tu yang 'gro bar mi byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170b-21: 'gro bar sems bskyed par yang mi byed mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170b-22: 'on kyang de de dag la phrag dog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170b-23: ser sna'i sems skyed par byed snyam mam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170b-29: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170b-31: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos de khyim gang dag nas tshig snyam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170b-32: bdag la gus par nyan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170b-34: btung ba rnyed pa'i khyim de dag mngon par dad par byas shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170b-35: dge slong gzhan dag gi nye bar 'tsho bar byas nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:170b-36: de dag tu lan gnyis su 'jug par mi byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:171a-0: log par lta ba dang ldan pa'i khyim gang dag yin pa de @171a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:171a-2: de dag khro zhing gshe na yang yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:171a-3: yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur ba'i phan pa'i dngos po nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:171a-4: lhag pa'i bsam pa nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:171a-8: snying rje dang ldan pa nyid la ltos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:171a-10: de ltar na sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni khyim bdag dad par byas shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:171a-11: gzhan gyi nye bar 'tsho bar byed kyi bdag nyid kyi chos gos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:171a-12: bsod snyoms kyi don du byed pa ni ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:171a-15: byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:171a-16: khyod yid gnyis dang the tshom za bar gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:171a-17: khyod kyis de ltar mi lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:171a-18: nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:171a-19: byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos zhes bya bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:171a-21: de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' khyim rnams su 'gro bar 'dod pas ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:171a-22: byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus mos de'i rjes su bslab par bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:171a-23: de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum chogs pa dag gi rjes su yang bslab par bya zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:171a-24: de dag gi chos kun tu spyad bar yang bya'o ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:171a-27: yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:171b-0: byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba'i dge slong kha cig 'byung bar @171b 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:171b-4: bsod snyoms kyi don du khyim rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:171b-5: khyim pa rnams dad pa la dgod pa'i phyir ni ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:171b-6: de dag ni gcig la gcig bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:171b-8: rtsod pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:171b-9: de dag ni ji ltar gzhan dag gis ma rnyed pas yi rangs bar 'gyur ba ltar bdag nyid kyis rnyed pas ni de lta ma yin la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:171b-10: ji ltar gzhan dag gis rnyed pas yid mi bde bar 'gyur pa ltar /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:171b-11: bdag nyid kyis ma rnyed pas ni de ltar ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:171b-13: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas ni bdag nyid kyi bde ba'i yo byang de dag thams cad la mi lta bar gzhan dag la sbyin par bya ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:171b-14: de dag ji tsam du phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba la ltos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:171b-17: 'di ltar des ni bdag gis sems can thams cad la bde ba bskyed par bya'o zhes snying rje chen po sngon du btang ba'i sems bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:171b-21: tshong dpon nam; khyim bdag gcig la bu gcig pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:171b-24: yid du 'ong ba zhig bdog par gyur pa de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:171b-25: le lan 'ga' zhig gi phyir rgyal pos brtson rar bcug par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:171b-29: khyim bdag de yid la byed pa'i sems ji lta bu dag gis rgyal pos brtson ra der 'jug par 'gyur snyam de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:172a-1: ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:172a-3: de ni 'di ltar bu gcig pa de thar bar bgyi ba'i bsam pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:172a-4: bdag gis bu gcig pa 'di btson ra 'di nas myur du thar par bgyi'o snyam nas bu gcig pa yid la bgyid pa kho na dag gis brtson ra der 'jug par bgyid de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:172a-5: thar par yid la bgyid pa dag gis 'jug cing 'byung bar bgyid lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:172a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:172a-8: ngas dpe de ni don shes par bya ba'i phyir brjod pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:172a-9: 'dir don kyang gang zhig yin par blta bar bya zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:172a-13: rgyal po'i brtson ra de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni 'khor ba'i brtson rar blta bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:172a-18: khyim bdag de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni byang chub sems dpa' blta bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:172a-22: bu gcig pa ji lta ba de bzhin du ni byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya bar blta bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:172a-27: khyim bdag de rgyu gzhan gyi phyir ma yin zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:172a-28: chad ka gzhan gyi phyir ma yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:172b-0: bu gcig de'i don du btson ra der 'jug par 'gyur ba ji lta ba de bzhin @172b du ni; byams pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:172b-1: byang chub sems dpas chos gos kyi ched dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:172b-2: bsod snyoms kyi ched du khyim rnams su 'gro bar mi bya'i /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:172b-3: 'di ltar sems can de dag nyid 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir khyim rnams su 'gro bar bya ba la blta bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:172b-5: yang byi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dge slong lus ma bsgoms pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:172b-8: shes rab ma bsgoms pa kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:172b-9: de dag ni chos gos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:172b-10: bsod snyoms kyi che dud me tog gi skyes dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:172b-13: yo byad kyi skyes dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:172b-14: byas pa'i lan gyi skyes dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:172b-16: byis pa dge slong gis ni me tog phreng brgyud lta bur mi bya zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:172b-17: bran dang las mi lta bu yang mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:172b-19: dge slong khyim rnams su 'gro bar 'dod pas ni chos kyi skyes kyis 'gro bar bya bar ma gtogs par /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:172b-20: skyes gzhan bkur bar mi bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:172b-21: des ni mang du thos pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:172b-22: gzhung la shin tu zhugs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:172b-27: bdag gir bya ba med par bya zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:172b-28: chos la dga' ba bskyed nas khyim rnams su 'gro bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:172b-29: khyim rnams su song nas kyang sangs rgyas dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:172b-31: dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod par bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:173a-5: shes rab kyi bsngags pa brjod par bya zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:173a-6: chos kyi gtam bya ba'i skyes ma gtogs par; khang khyim gyi ched dam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:173a-9: reg pa bde ba'i gtam mam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:173a-17: gtam gzhan gyi skyes dag mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:173a-19: gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:173a-20: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo zhig la byin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:173a-21: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bsdus te rigs kyi bu'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:173a-22: rigs kyi bu mo de la byin par gyur na nor gyi phung po de tsam dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:173a-23: bde ba'i yo byad de tsam gyis ni /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:173a-27: re zhig dad pa thob par ma gyur du zin kyang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:173b-2: snying brtse ba ches shin tu mang du byed pa yin no //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:173b-5: sangs rgyas kyi bka' spangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:173b-6: 'jig rten pa'i gtam nye bar sbyor bar byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:173b-7: ji tsam du don med pa chen pos khyim der mngon par brtson par byed pa la ltos /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:173b-18: bde ba'i yo byad gzhan dag gis ni /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:173b-33: 'khrug pa dag las yongs su thar bar mi 'gyur gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:173b-34: chos thos pas ni sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams kyang skye ba las yongs su thar par 'gyur la /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:174a-7: stong chen 'jig rten khams ni gser dag gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:174a-8: bkang ste gang la sbyin par byed pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:174a-9: tshig bzhi'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig brjod pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:174a-10: ji ltar phan 'dogs de ltar 'gyur ma yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:174a-11: phan 'dogs byed par 'dod pa gang zhig gis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:174a-12: 'jig rten gsum na sems can thams cad kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:174a-13: bde ba gang dag yod pa de dag kun //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:174a-15: gang gis de la sangs rgyas lugs kyi ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:174a-16: tshig bzhi'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig bsgrags na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:174a-17: de ni shin tu phan 'dogs mchog yin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:174a-18: des ni sdug bsngal dag las grol bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:174a-21: byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu bkang ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:174a-22: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dbul ba phul ba bas ni snying rje chen po bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:174a-23: sems can gcig la tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig cig gis bsgrags par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:174a-24: de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:174a-25: de la 'di skad ces bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:174a-26: mi gang gis ni gangg'a'i bye snyed kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:174b-0: @174b 'jig rten khams mchog rin chen gang byas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:174b-1: dga' mchog sems kyis rgyal la phul ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:174b-2: gang gis sems can gcig la tshigs bcad byin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:174b-3: rin chen sbyin pa shin tu rgya chen des; ;tshigs bcad sbyin pa snying rjes bsgrubs de la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:174b-4: char yang mi phod grangs su'ang ma yin na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:174b-5: gnyis sam gsum la bsam du ga la yod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:174b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:174b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag g-yas pa'i dkyil na bsod nams thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa'i rgyu mthun pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer mngon par grub pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:174b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:174b-10: phyag g-yas pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kun tu g-yogs par mdzad nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:174b-11: sems can thams cad la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad nye bar bsgrubs par mdzad cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:174b-12: zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:174b-13: skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:174b-14: gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:174b-15: rin po che 'dod pa rnams la ni rin po che rnams gang ci 'dod pa de la sbyin par yang spyod mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:174b-16: de tsam gyis sems can de dag 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thog ma dang tha ma med pa nas chu srin 'dzin khri'i sdug bsngal chen po de las thar bar mi 'gyur bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:175a-0: nga ni 'jig rten pa'i bde ba'i yo byad de lta bu dag rnam par spangs @175a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:175a-1: nas; 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba'i chos rin po che yang dag par ston par mdzad de /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:175a-4: de lta bas na khyed kyis kyang nga'i rjes su bslab par bya zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:175a-5: khyed zang zing la gdu bar mi bya'i /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:175a-6: khyed chos la gdu bar bya'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:175a-15: phyin chad sdom par yang mi byed la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:175a-16: phyin chad yang dag par bsdam pa'i phyir sdom par yang mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:175a-17: ngas ni sngon byas pa'i sdig pa'i las zad par bya ba'i phyir /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:175a-19: de la mi blun po de dag ni lhag par ltung ba mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:175a-20: nyes pa bshags shing sbyang ba tsam gyis dag par 'gyur bar sems shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:175a-21: phyin chad sdom par ni mi byed do //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:175b-28: don bya ba ji snyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:175b-29: bya ba ji snyed pa de snyed ni /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:178a-2: 'di tsam du mthu dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:178a-3: 'di tsam du brtson 'grus dang ldan pa la la zhig skyes par gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:178a-4: des rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po de dag na chu'i phung po gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad chu klung chen po'i rgyun gang dang gang dag nas rgya mtsho chen por zhugs par gyur pa'i chu klung chen po'i rgyun de dag nyid nas chu'i mtha' phyir bzlog nas rgyun las bzlog thabs kho nar mtsho chen po ma dros pa'i nang du phab par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:178a-7: mi de dka' ba byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:178a-9: brtson 'grus che ba yin snyam mam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:178a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:178a-16: byams pa khyod mos par bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:178a-17: khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:178a-18: de bas kyang gang dag lhag pa'i bsam pas sems can thams cad kyi don du snying rje chen po kun du bskyed nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:178a-19: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:178a-20: nan tan gyis mdzes par byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:178a-21: ngo mtshar che ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:178a-22: de bas kyang gang sangs rgyas yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:178b-0: nyes par byas pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yod do zhes nges par rtog par byed pa de dag @178b ches shin tu dga' ba byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:178b-1: ngo mtshar che ba yin no //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:178b-3: zhe sdang gi sems skyes pa sel bar byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:178b-4: gti mug gi sems skyes pa sel bar byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:178b-5: ngo mtshar che ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:178b-6: de bas kyang gang dag mdza' bshes dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:178b-9: rgan rabs rnams la mi lta bar spangs shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:178b-11: longs spyod chen po'i tshogs rnams kyang yongs su spangs nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:178b-12: legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'du lba la rab tu 'byung ba'i sems kyis khyim gyi gnas nas gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:178b-13: ngo mtshar che ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:178b-14: de bas kyang gang dag gos dur smrig dag bgos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:178b-15: legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par legs pa kho nar rab tu 'byung bar byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:178b-16: ngo mtshar che ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:178b-17: de bas kyang gang dag de dag rab tu byung nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:178b-18: gdams ngag la nan tan gyis mdzes par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:178b-19: bslab pa'i gzhi ji ltar bcas pa dag la slob par byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:178b-20: ngo mtshar che ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:178b-21: de bas kyang gang dag 'du 'dzi'i gtam la 'jigs par lta zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:178b-22: dben pa 'dod pas dgon pa la mngon par phyogs te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179a-1: shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179a-2: ngo mtshar che ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179a-3: de bas kyang gang dag chos thams cad stong pa'o zhes mos par byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' ba byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179a-4: ngo mtshar che ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179a-5: de bas kyang gang dag chos zab mo rnams la rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob pa de dag ches shin tu dga' ba byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179a-6: ngo mtshar che ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179a-7: de bas kyang gang dag rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag mngon sum du byas nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rjes su thob par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179a-8: dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu rjes su thob par byed pa de dag ches shin tu dka' bar byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179a-9: ngo mtshar che ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179a-13: 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la dad cing dang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179a-14: rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs dge slong gi dngos po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179a-15: 'bras bu thob pa de ni shin tu dka' ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179a-17: de la yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub par gyur pa'i dus la bab pa'i tshe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179a-18: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu byung nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179a-19: byang chub sems dpa'i las spangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179a-20: byis pa'i las la rab tu gnas pa kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179a-22: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179b-0: nyi shu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi @179b las yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179b-1: de dag yongs su ma rdzogs na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179b-3: ser sna'i sems tshar gcad par bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179b-4: gtong ba chen po spel bar bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179b-5: 'chal ba'i tshul khrims yongs su spang bar bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179b-6: tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179b-7: gnod sems dang tha ba'i skyon rnam par spang bar bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179b-8: bzod pa'i stobs la gnas par bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179b-9: le lo'i sems rnam par mnan par bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179b-10: brtson 'grus chen po brtsam par bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179b-11: brjed ngas pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179b-13: blo gros kyis bsam gtan rnams la mi brten par bsam gtan du bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179b-14: zab mo la bzod pa bsgom par bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179b-15: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu rtogs par bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179b-16: rnam par rtog pa thams cad spang bar bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179b-17: mtshan ma med pas gnas par bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179b-18: smon pa dang bral bar bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179b-19: smon pa med pa'i yul yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179b-20: sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtang bar bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179b-21: snying rje chen pos gnas par bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179b-23: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dga' ba'i sems yid la mi bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179b-24: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos shing nem nur med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179b-25: yid ches par bya ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:179b-27: nyi shu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180a-1: de dag yongs su ma rdzogs na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180a-2: byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180a-5: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa'i dam bca' ba yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180a-7: bdag nyid kyi bde ba spong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180a-8: chos kyis ngoms mi shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180a-9: chos yongs su tshol bas bdag sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180a-10: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180a-11: sems can rnams 'khor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa las thar bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180a-12: sems can gyi khams tshad med pa rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya'o zhes yang dag par dam bca' ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180a-14: bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag par dam bca' ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180a-17: mi sman mkhas la gsang sngags mkhas shing dug dang rtsi la mkhas pa gnyis shig yod par gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180a-18: de gnyis las mi gcig gis skye bo phal po che'i mdun du ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes bskyed par bya ba'i phyir dug za bar byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180a-19: zos nas kyang yan lag dang nyid lag rnams shig shig por gyur pas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar gyur pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180a-20: yang gsang sngags sngon du btang ba'i sman za bar byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180a-21: de gsang sngags yang dag pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180a-22: sman des dug gi nyes pa de dag dang bral bar gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180b-0: de nas mi des dus gzhan gyi tshe na sman de ma rnyed cing @180b gnyen po ma rnyed pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180b-1: dug des shi bar gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180b-2: de nas mi cig shos des 'di skad ces smras te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180b-3: kho bos ni sman gyis dug zhi bar byed nus mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180b-4: 'on kyang kho bo la ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes mi dgos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180b-5: yan lag dang nying lag shig shig phor 'gyur ba mi dgos pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180b-7: sman yang mi 'thung ngo zhes zer ba de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180b-9: phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180b-10: rab tu byung ba kha cig 'di skad ces sdig pa'i las ni nyes pa bshags pas ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro zhes zer zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180b-11: de dag sdig pa mngon par 'du byang mngon par 'du shes nas yang bshags par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180b-12: zhes ltung ba lhag par 'byin par byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180b-13: phyis sdom pa 'dzin par ni mi byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180b-14: de dag ni 'chi ba'i chos can yin no zhes nga smra ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180b-18: dug za ba'i mi de dang 'dra bar 'chi ba'i dus byas nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180b-19: log par ltung ba rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180b-21: byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180b-22: 'di skad ces bdag cag la dug kyang mi dgos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:180b-24: bdag cag ni 'das pa'i dus na sdig pa'i las byas pa zad par bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181a-0: da ltar byung ba na mngon par 'du mi bya ba ma gtogs par sdig pa'i las kyang mi bya @181a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181a-2: ltung ba yang 'byung bar mi bya la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181a-3: bshags par yang mi bya'o zhes zer te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181a-5: 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la dug ces bya ba de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181a-7: bslab pa'i gzhi ji ltar bcas pa dag las 'da' bar byed pa yin pas khyed cag gis ni dug bza' bar mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181a-9: bzhi po 'di dag ni 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181a-10: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gcod par byed pa'i chos rnams yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181a-11: de dag ni nyan thos kyis kyang bya ba ma yin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181a-12: byang chub sems dpas lta smos kyang ci dgos bzhi gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181a-13: byas pa mi bzo ba nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181a-14: g-yo la brten pa nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181a-15: rdzun gyi tshig smra ba nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181a-16: bslab pa las 'da' bar byed pa nyid yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181a-17: bzhi po de dag ni 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181a-18: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gcod par byed pa'i chos rnams yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181a-19: de dag ni nyan thos kyis kyang bya ba ma yin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181a-20: byang chub sems dpa' rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181a-22: byang chub sems dpas chos bzhi po 'di dag las dpag tshad brgyar 'byol bar bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181a-26: tshigs su bcad pa dang; sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181a-28: gnas gang na gnas pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181a-29: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gzhan zhig kyang 'dug par gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181b-0: gal @181b te de dang lhan cig tu mgu ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181b-2: mchog tu dga' ba skyes la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181b-3: 'thab pa med pa dang ldan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181b-4: rtsod pa med pa dang ldan par gnas na ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181b-6: gal te de de la tha na tha ba dang zhe sdang gi sems gcig tsam zhig skyed par byed na yang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181b-7: des de nas dpag tshad brgyar 'byol bar bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181b-8: byang chub sems dpas ni byang chub sems dpa' la tha ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181b-9: zhe sdang gi sems bskyed par mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181b-11: byang chub sems dpas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa'i sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la spyos sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181b-14: mtshon gyis btab par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181b-17: byang chub sems dpa' des sems can ji snyed cig la spyos pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181b-20: mtshon gyis btab pa'i gzhi de las sdig pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181b-22: nyams pa mang po bskyed par 'gyur snyam mam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181b-25: sems can gcig cig la spyos sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181b-28: mtshon gyis btab na yang bsod nams ma lags pa mang du bskyed lags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181b-29: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa thams cad la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:181b-30: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:182a-1: chub sems dpas ni sems can 'ga' tsam la yang tha ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:182a-3: gnod sems bskyed par mi bgyi ba'i slad du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:182a-4: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:182a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:182a-7: byang chub sems dpas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad spyos sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:182a-10: mtshon gyis btab pa gang yin pa des ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:182a-11: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig la tha na tha ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:182a-12: zhe sdang gi sems gcig tsam zhig bskyed par gyur pa de tsam du byang chub sems dpa' de smas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:182a-15: byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' cig shos de la tha ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:182a-16: zhe sdang gi sems bskyed par byed na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:182a-17: gal te byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub yongs su mi gtong ba zhig yin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:182a-18: sems ji snyed bskyed pa de snyed kho na'i bskal par byang chub kyi phyir yang go cha bgo bar bya dgos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:182a-22: lcags ni lcags nyid kyis gcod par byed pa ma gtogs par bong ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:182a-24: rtsvas gcod par mi nus pa de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:182a-26: byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang byang chub sems dpa' cig shos la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:182b-0: zhe sdang gi sems bskyed pas zad par byed pa @182b ma gtogs par gzhan gyis zad par mi 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:182b-2: de lta bas na khyed cag gis gcig la gcig zhe sa dang bcas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:182b-3: gcig la gcig gus pa dang bcas pas gnas par bya'o zhes de ltar bslab par bya zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:182b-4: sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la yang ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:182b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:187a-20: tshul 'chos pa lags par 'tshal bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de dag legs pa legs par bshad du gsol /
