K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:187a-23: 'di ltar gnas de dag thos na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:187b-0: byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa gang dag lags pa de dag @187b kyang bdag nyid bsrung bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:187b-1: de skad ces gsol ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:187b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:187b-4: phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma de la byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin cing lhag pa'i bsam pa nyam chung ba de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:187b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la me tog dang; bdug pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:187b-14: mar me'i sbyin pa dag gis mchod pa'i las la brtson par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:187b-16: ngas ni shes pa dang mi ldan pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir mchod pa bshad pa yin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:187b-17: mi blun po de dag ni de la brtson par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:187b-19: ngas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du dge slong dag khyed cag ni bdag nyid dul ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:187b-20: zhi bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson pas gnas par gyis shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:187b-22: khyim bdag dad pa dang ldan pa dag yod na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:187b-23: de dag ni nga'i sku gdung rnams la sku gdung gi mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:187b-26: mi blun po de dag rnal 'byor kyang spangs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:187b-29: kha ton bya ba yang spangs nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:187b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gi mchod pa'i las la brtson par 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:188a-0: de dag la brten nas 'tsho bar @188a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:188a-1: sems par byed pa de dag la ltos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:188a-3: byang chub sems dpa' gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di chu'i phung po nas bzung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:188a-4: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi mthar thug pa'i bar du 'bru mar gyis yongs su bkang ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:188a-5: mar me'i snying po ri rab tsam bcugs nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:188a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir mar me bus pa bas ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:188a-7: byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:188a-8: tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas pa cig shos kyis mkhan po'am slob dpon gyi drung nas tshig bzhi ba'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig lung mnos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:188a-9: kha ton byed cing gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed pa gang yin pa de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:188a-10: de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:188a-12: byang chub sems dpa' gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di me tog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:188a-15: spos kyis rab tu bkang ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:188a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:188a-17: lo 'bum gyi bar du nyid lan gsum /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:188a-18: mtshan lan gsum phul ba bas ni byang chub sems dpa' 'du 'dzi'i gtam gyis 'jigs shing skrag pa gzhan zhig khams gsum thams cad kyis 'jigs shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:188b-0: sems can gyis don mngon par bsgrub @188b ba na dgon po la mngon par phyogs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:188b-1: gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed pa gang yin pa de de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:188b-4: de bzhin gshegs pas kyal ka'i ched dam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:188b-5: brjod pa'i ched du de skad gsungs pa ma yin grang snyam na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:188b-7: khyod kyis de ltar mi lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:188b-9: de ni nga la mngon sum yin pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:188b-11: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:188b-12: bskal pa grangs med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:188b-14: ches shin tu grangs med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:188b-17: bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:188b-18: dpag tu med pa dag byung ba de'i tshe de'i dus na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:188b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog sna tshogs zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:188b-20: rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:188b-23: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:188b-25: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:188b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de'i nyan thos rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po ni bye ba 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug tu gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:188b-30: gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba chos dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:188b-31: chos kyi rgyal po zhig byung bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:189a-0: @189a *// rgyal po mu khyud de la bu dpa' ba rtul phod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:189a-1: yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:189a-2: pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms par byed pa stong yod par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:189a-4: rgyal po mu khyud de'i bu stong po de dag gi rjes la de'i pang bar chos zhes bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:189a-5: chos bzang zhes bya ba'i khye'u gnyis shig pa rdzus te skyes par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:189a-7: rgyal po mu khyud des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:189a-8: lo brgyad khri bzhi stong rdzogs kyi bar du las gzhan mi byed par khyim gyi yid la byed pa thams cad spangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:189a-14: yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:189a-15: dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams pa yang zhag bdun bdun 'das shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:189a-16: chos gos yid du 'ong ba gzhan dang gzhan dag phul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:189a-17: gang dang gang ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de dag la kha zas kyi rnam pa yid du 'ong ba de lta de lta bu dag kyang phul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:189a-18: gang dang gang dag ji dang ji lta bu 'dod pa de dag gis gtsug lag khang yid du 'ong ba de lta de lta bu dag kyang brtsig tu bcug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:189a-19: dge slong re re la yang 'chags dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:189a-21: bsnyen bkur ba bdun bdun dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:189b-0: ro brgya dang ldan @189b ba'i kha zas dag kyang phul lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:189b-2: 'di ltar rgyal po mu khyud des /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:189b-3: khang bzang khor khor yug tu dpag tshad brgyad cu yod pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:189b-4: ngos bzhi khang mig can shin tu 'brel ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:189b-5: bkra ba blta na sdug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:189b-7: shin tu zin par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:189b-8: 'khrul 'khor gyi srid bus yongs su sbyang ba byas pa dag kyang byed du bcug ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:189b-9: gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag khang bzang de dag na bzhugs pa de'i tshe /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:189b-10: 'khrul 'khor gyi srad bu de dag shugs kyis khang bzang de dag gi steng nas me tog kha dog rnam ba du ma'i char dag kyang 'bab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:189b-11: me tog de dag gis khang bzang de dag pus mo nub tsam du gang bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:189b-13: de ltar rgyal po mu khyud des /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:189b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong rdzogs kyi bar du yon tan bkod pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:189b-15: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bkur sti byas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:189b-16: bla mar byas; ri mor byas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:189b-19: de nas lo brgyad khri bzhi stong pa de dag 'das pa'i phyis de nyid par /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:189b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad lags pa'i 'og tu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:189b-22: chos bzang gnyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa thams cad dang bcas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190a-0: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag @190a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190a-1: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog sna tshogs de'i spyan sngar btud nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa de la yid kyis zhu ba 'di skad ces yongs su zhus so; ;bcom ldan 'das /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190a-3: rgyal po mu khyud 'dis yun ring po 'di srid du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190a-4: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa rnam pa mang po 'di lta bu thams cad zil gyis non cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190a-5: yongs su gtugs te gnas par 'gyur ba'i sbyin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190a-8: dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan zhig mchis lags sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190a-10: de ltar khye'u de gnyis kyis zhabs gnyis la gtugs ma thag tu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190a-11: de nas skad cig de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de rab tu g-yos shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190a-12: 'jig rten du sa g-yos pa chen po yang byung bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de'i bsnyen bkur ba thub dka' zhes bya ba zhig yod par gyur pa gang yin pa de stan las langs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190a-15: chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190a-16: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190a-17: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190a-20: 'jig rten dogs cher g-yos pa 'di'i rgyu ni gang lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190b-0: rkyen ni gang @190b lags; ci'i slad du na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190b-1: khye'u 'di gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs par gyur lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190b-3: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des bsnyen bkur ba thub dka' la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190b-6: gtam de lta bu yongs su zhus pas khyod la ci bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190b-7: gal te de bzhin gshegs pas khye'u 'di gnyis kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa ji lta bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190b-8: zab mo la bzod pa bsgom pa ji lta bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190b-9: snying rje chen po ji lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs pa'i gnas de bshad par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190b-10: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di rmongs par 'gyur ro ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190b-13: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190b-14: nyan thos chen po rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i mchog sred med kyi bu zhes bya ba la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190b-15: sred med kyi bu khyod longs la khye'u 'di gnyis slong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190b-16: rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu ston cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190b-17: 'od srung; de nas dge slong sred med kyi bu des de las khye'u gcig lag pa g-yas pas bslangs la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190b-18: khye'u cig shos lag pa g-yon pas bslangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190b-19: gyen du 'phang ngo snyam na gdeg par ma nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190b-20: des yang rgya cher mthu dang stobs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:190b-23: rdzu 'phrul chen po yang dag par bstan cing gyen du 'phang ngo snyam na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:191a-1: rtse mo'i cha shas tsam yang bskyod pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:191a-4: de ltar des khye'u de gnyis shin tu gyen du 'phang par bskyed pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:191a-5: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams brag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:191a-9: chu dang bcas pa de rab tu g-yos shing bla 'og tu 'gul bar gyur kyang khye'u de gnyis bslang bar ni ma nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:191a-11: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des de'i tshe /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:191a-12: nyan thos chen po de'i sems yang dag par rab tu bzung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:191a-13: rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu nye bar bsgrub pa mdzad de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:191a-14: rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu nye bar bsgrubs pa des dge slong sred med kyi bu des 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'gul ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:191a-18: tha na khye'u de gnyis skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam yang g-yo ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:191a-19: 'gul bar byed mi nus so; ;'od srung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:191a-20: de nas dge slong sred med kyi bu des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:191a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:191a-23: bdag rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs las yongs su nyams pa'am gcig tu ma gyur lags grang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:191b-0: de ci'i @191b slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:191b-2: 'di ltar bdag gis khye'u skyes nas ring po ma lags pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:191b-3: byis pa'i gzugs su mchis pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:191b-4: lus bong chung du 'di gnyis kyis dog sa la gtugs pa yang bslang bar rngo ma thogs pa'i slad du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:191b-5: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:191b-6: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:191b-7: dge slong sred med kyi bu de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:191b-8: sred med gyi bu khyod rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs las yongs su ma nyams mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:191b-9: 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin pas de ni nyan thos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:191b-10: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rnam par dkrugs pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:191b-11: bsam par sla ba ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:191b-12: sred med kyi bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na; sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:191b-14: ngas da ltar khyod nyid nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang ldan par gyur cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:191b-15: de tsam du rdzu 'phrul che ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:191b-16: de tsam du mthu che ba'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis bskal pa bye ba snyed da rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gi rnam par 'phrul pa byas kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:191b-17: de dag gi khye'u 'di gnyis bslang ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:192a-0: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des tshig de skad @192a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:192a-2: 'khor de las srog chags 'bum phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:192a-3: de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:192a-4: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:192a-5: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob pa kho na yin yang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:192a-6: gang la nyan thos chen po 'di dag brdugs par byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:192a-7: bkod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de lta bu dang ldan pa de ni ngo mtshar te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:192a-8: bdag cag gis kyang byin gyi rlabs de lta bu thob par bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:192a-9: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyang thob par bya'o snyam du sems shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:192a-10: de ltar yang dag par shes pa'i srog chags 'bum phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:192a-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba zhig 'khor de nyid du 'dus te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:192a-13: 'dug par gyur pa de stan las langs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:192a-14: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:197b-0: chos thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis stong @197b pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:197b-1: zhes rab tu rtogs par byed pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:197b-3: bsod nams kyi phung po de la bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:197b-4: brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:197b-8: bye ba phrag brgya'i cha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:197b-9: bye ba phrag stong gi cha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:197b-10: bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:197b-11: bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bar gyi cha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:197b-17: rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:197b-19: de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des khye'u de gnyis la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:197b-21: byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:197b-23: sangs rgyas kyi gnas ba rgya chen pos gnas pa 'thob par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:197b-26: rgya chen po la 'jug pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:197b-27: chos rgya chen po 'chad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:197b-28: sbyin pa rgya chen po yongs su gtong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:197b-29: rgya chen po la mos pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:197b-31: byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:197b-33: sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa rgya chen pos gnas pa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:197b-35: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des khye'u de gnyis la de lta de ltar chos bstan pas khye'u de gnyis chos kyi mchog tu dga' bde nyid kyis ta la bdun srid tsam du mngon par 'phags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198a-0: de gnyis steng gi bar snang la 'khod @198a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198a-1: nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la gnyi gas tshigs mthun par tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198a-2: thub pa spyod pa thams cad mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198a-3: spyod pa kun la mkhas pa lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198a-4: sems can rnams la gtong ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198a-5: de bzhin stong la mi gnas ston //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198a-6: 'di la bdag dang sems can dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198a-7: srog dang gang zag ma mchis par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198a-8: bzod pa bla med gang lags pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198a-9: sbyin pa de ni byin chen lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198a-10: bzod pa zab mo sgom byos la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198a-11: de la'ang rtog pa ma byed ces //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198a-13: dpa' chen khyod ni ngo mtshar lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198a-14: gang la chags la sogs med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198a-15: byang chub dam pa don du gnyer //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198a-16: ye shes chen po sbyang byas nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198a-17: de la'ang rlom sems ma byed ces //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198a-18: rnam grol stong pa bsgom par bgyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198a-19: de la'ang rnam rtog ma byed cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198a-20: dgon pa'i gnas ni ston byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198a-21: dben pa'i gnas zhes gsung ba mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198a-22: rlom sems yongs su spang ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198a-23: sbyin pa rtag tu byin par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198a-25: de ni rdul bral mtha' yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198a-26: zhi ba'i gnas la mi g-yo ba'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198a-27: tshul khrims yongs su sbyang bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198a-28: gang gi zhi tshul mdzes rtogs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198a-29: de ni tshul khrims mchog yin gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198a-30: bzod pa rtag tu bsgom gyis la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198a-31: sems can rnams la rtog ma byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198a-32: rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198a-33: de ni bzod pa yin par gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198b-0: brtson 'grus brtan pa'ang @198b brtsam par byos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198b-1: 'dus byas kun kyang spang bar gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198b-2: dben par lta ba gang yin pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198b-3: de ni sangs rgyas brtson 'grus gsung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198b-4: dngos po'i dngos de med pas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198b-5: dngos po thams cad bsreg par bya; ;nyon mongs med pa gang yin pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198b-6: de ni rtog med bsam gtan yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198b-7: tshu rol ma yin pha rol min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198b-8: dbus su'ang gnas par mi bya ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198b-9: dus gsum mnyam lta gang yin pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198b-10: de ni shes rab dam pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198b-11: dgon pa'i 'du shes bsgom bya zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198b-12: 'du shes de la'ang lta mi bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198b-14: des de 'du shes med ces bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198b-15: chos kyi sbyin pa'i yon tan dang; ;de bzhin phan yon rnams kyang bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198b-16: de phyir rlom sems med pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198b-17: ji ltar thos pa'i chos kyang shod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198b-18: yi ge rnams ni zad med de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198b-19: rang bzhin gyis ni 'grub pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198b-20: de phyir chos la mi rlom zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198b-21: khyed kyis 'bras bu med mi bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198b-22: bdag ni chos ston byed pa'o zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198b-24: des ni chos nyid mi shes pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198b-25: de ni bdud kyi zhags pas bcings //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198b-26: bdag gis sangs rgyas mthong ngo zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198b-28: de la de ma thag tu ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198b-29: bdud rtsi dug gi btung bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198b-30: gang zhig rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198b-31: rtogs par 'dod dam nyan thos sam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198b-32: rgang rgyal byang chub rtogs 'dod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198b-33: de ni tshul 'di bsam par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198b-34: rnam grol ye shes dpag med kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:198b-35: gcig pa nyid du bstan pa mdzad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199a-2: byang chub dam pa don du gnyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199a-3: gang zhig 'jig rten mgon po'i sku //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199a-4: mtshan gyis brgyan ba ci 'dra ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199a-6: byang chub mchog la gnas par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199a-7: chos kun rgyu las 'byung ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199a-8: byed pa po ni dmigs su med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199a-9: chos rnams brten nas byung ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199a-10: yang dag rang bzhin yong min zhes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199a-12: dpa' chen khyod ni ngo mtshar lags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199a-14: de ltar khye'u de gnyis kyis bar snang de las tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras pa'i tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199a-15: rgyal po mu khyud de'i grong khyer ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199a-18: steng gi bar snang la lhag gang dag 'dus te 'khod par gyur pa de dag las srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gsum bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199a-19: sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag gis ni dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs yongs su bsgrub pa'i rgyu bskyed par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199a-22: chos bzang gnyis par snang de las babs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199a-23: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de'i zhabs la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199a-25: bdag cag gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199a-27: dge slong gi dge 'dun ni la skyabs su mchi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199b-0: bla na @199b med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199b-1: sems kyi rang bzhin gyis byang chub kyi rang bzhin rjes su rtogs par yang bgyid lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199b-3: 'dir sems bskyed pa de ni 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199b-4: chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199b-5: 'dir sems bskyed pa de ni 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199b-6: chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa ma mchis pa kho na lags so; ;de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199b-7: gang la mngon par zhen pa mchis pa de la ni skye ba 'ga' zhig mchis gda'i /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199b-8: gang la mngon par zhen pa ma mchis pa de la ni skye ba 'ga' yang ma mchis pa'i slad du ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199b-11: skye ba nyid skye ba ma mchis pa lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199b-12: ci'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa zhes bgyi zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199b-13: de la skye ba'i gzhi 'jug pa ma mchis pas de'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199b-14: skye ba ma mchis pa de la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199b-15: brjod pa de yang brjod par mi bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199b-16: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199b-17: ji tsam du brjod pa ma mchis pa de tsam du skye ba dang 'gag pa mchis kyi; de ltar ye shes shin tu rnam par dag pa gang lags pa de la ni skye ba yang ma mchis /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199b-19: gang la skye ba ma mchis pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199b-20: 'gag pa ma mchis pa de ni bas ba ma 'tshal ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:199b-21: gtan du bas pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200a-0: de lta lags pas bdag cag gnyis ni mnyam pa nyid kyi mtha' des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs @200a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200a-1: pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs shing chos 'ga' la yang dmigs par mi bgyid /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200a-2: chos 'ga' yang thob par mi bgyid /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200a-3: chos 'ga' yang thob par bgyid du stsol bar mi bgyid de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200a-4: mnyam pa nyid gang lags pa de kho na rjes su rtogs par bgyid par bas kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200a-5: chos 'ga' yang rjes su rtogs par ni mi bgyid lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200a-6: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200a-7: chos thams cad ni gzod ma nas rnam par dag pa lags pa'i slad du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200a-9: de ltar khye'u de gnyis kyis de skad smras pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200a-10: byang chub sems dpa' khris ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200a-11: rgyal po mu khyud kyang bu stong po de dag dang lhan cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200a-12: rgyal po lnga stong de dag dang lhan cig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200a-14: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200a-15: lhung bzed bzhag ste phyag bcabs nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200a-17: skye bo phal po che de dag la chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200a-20: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200b-0: chos bzang gnyis kyis pha ma la gsol ba btab nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par legs pa kho @200b nar rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir mngon par byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200b-1: de gnyis rang gi grong khyer chen po nas mngon par byung ba'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200b-2: rab byung sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200b-3: nges 'byung ba de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200b-4: khyim gnas nyon mongs gnas pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200b-5: dkar chos rnam par 'jig par byed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200b-6: gang zhig dkar po'i chos rnams ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200b-8: rab tu 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200b-9: 'jig rten mgon thad myur du song //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200b-10: bskal pa bye bar rab spyod kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200b-11: 'dod pa rnams la ngoms pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200b-12: khyim na gnas pa 'dod rnams kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200b-14: ji ltar rgya mtsho chu klung rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200b-16: de bzhin byis pa 'dod rnams la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200b-17: bsten pas nam yang ngoms mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200b-18: dper na me ni rtsva dag dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200b-19: shing gis nam yang ngoms pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200b-20: de bzhin byis pa 'dod rnams la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200b-21: bsten pas ngoms par 'gyur ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200b-24: de phyir chags pa yongs spangs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200b-25: rab tu 'byung phyir mngon byung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200b-26: 'jig rten mgon po bla na med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200b-27: snga ma 'ga' yang gang gi phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200b-28: khyim gyi gnas na gnas mdzad nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200b-29: bla med byang chub brnyes pa med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200b-30: sngon gyi sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:200b-31: gang su mya ngan 'das gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201a-2: bla med byang chub brnyes par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201a-3: de phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201a-4: bsten pa'i dgon pa de slobs la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201a-5: khyim gnas sred pa spongs byos dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201a-6: de ni bde legs nyid du 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201a-7: gang zhig khyim na gnas nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201a-8: stong gsum thams cad rin chen gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201a-9: rab tu bkang ste 'jig rten gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201a-10: mgon la yon du 'bul byed la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201a-11: mkhas pa gang zhig yid byung zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201a-12: nyes pa shes nas khyim spangs te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201a-13: sangs rgyas rjes su slob byed la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201a-14: rab tu 'byung ba tshol byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201a-15: rab tu 'byung ba btsal byas nas; ;g-yel ba med pa 'dod rnams dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201a-16: khyim gyi gnas la mi lta bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201a-17: gom pa bdun ni 'dor byed na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201a-18: bsod nams phung po de la ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201a-19: snga mas rin gyi char mi chog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201a-20: de phyir sangs rgyas bsngags pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201a-21: rab tu 'byung phyir myur du deng //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201a-22: gang la chags pa yod min pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201a-23: shes pas rtag tu ngoms med na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201a-24: chags pa kun las rnam 'des pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201a-26: myur du dgon par gnas byed na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201a-28: nyes pa ji bzhin rnam rig nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201a-29: de dag las ni sems ldog 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201a-30: khyim ni myur du spangs nas su; ;dgon pa la ni gnas gyur pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201a-31: mkhas pa yang dag mthong ba rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201a-32: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjes su slong //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201a-33: gang dag byang chub phyir brtson pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201a-34: de dag dben pa bsten byed cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201b-0: de dag @201b dgon par dga' 'gyur gyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201b-1: de dag khyim la dga' mi 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201b-2: de ni sangs rgyas rnam dag gi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201b-3: spyod yul gnas dang spyod pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201b-5: de la byang chub rnyed dka' min //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201b-6: chags la sogs pas gzir ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201b-7: sems can grol byed su 'dod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201b-8: de ni khyim na gnas pa yis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201b-9: skrag cing dgon pa kun du bsten //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201b-10: gang zhig bdud las rgyal ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201b-13: des ni dgon pa bsten par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201b-15: de ltar khye'u chos dang chos bzang gnyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag smra zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201b-16: grong khyer chen po de nas phyir byung nas bcom ldan 'das me tog sna tshogs gal ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201b-17: bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201b-18: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201b-20: bdag cag gnyis bcom ldan 'das las rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par dge slong gi dngos po 'thob par 'gyur ba lags sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201b-22: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des khye'u de gnyis kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201b-23: khye'u de gnyis rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201b-24: 'od srung; de nas rgyal po mu khyud kyis khye'u de gnyis rab tu byung ba thos nas bu thu bo rgyal srid la bzhag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:201b-25: bu stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba rnams dang yang lhan cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202a-2: rgyal po lnga stong tsam po dag dang yang lhan cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202a-3: skye bo phal po che gzhan dag dang yang lhan cig tu thams cad khyim gyi gnas la mi lta bar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par legs pa kho nar rab tu 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir mngon par byung bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202a-4: de'i tshe na srog chags bye ba tham pa mngon par byung bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202a-5: de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202a-6: bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202a-7: bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202a-9: bdag cag bcom ldan 'das las rab tu byung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202a-10: bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob par 'gyur lags sam; 'od srung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202a-11: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des sems can de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202a-12: skye bo'i tshogs de dag thams cad rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202a-13: dge slong gi dngos po la rab tu bkod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202a-15: de nas rgyal po mu khyud kyis bu thu bo rgyal srid la bzhag pa gang yin pa de yang zhag bdun 'das pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202a-16: gcig pu dben par song nas 'du shes kyi rnam par rtog pa 'di lta bu 'di skyes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202a-17: bdag la rgyal srid kyis ci bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202a-18: dbang phyug gis kyang ci bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202b-0: bdag 'dod pa lhur @202b len cing 'dod pa'i 'ching bas bcings nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su spang bar ni mi bya'o snyam nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202b-1: das de'i mong la rab tu byung ba'i sems chen po bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202b-2: de tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya ba'i tshe /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202b-3: gling chen po bzhi po dag tu rgyu ba'i tshe na des tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202b-4: kho bo'i pha ma phu nu dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202b-5: rtsa lag rnams kyang rab byung phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202b-6: nges par byung ste chos don phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202b-7: srog chags bye ba tham pa byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202b-8: nga la khyim gyis ci bya ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202b-9: bdag kyang der ni 'gro bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202b-11: nga ni khyod kyi yongs 'dren te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202b-12: gang dag rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202b-13: sems bskyed byed pa de dag ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202b-14: khom ldan shin tu rnyed dka' bas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202b-16: gang dag khyim nas khyim med par //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202b-17: rab byung sems bskyed mi byed pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202b-18: de dag 'dren chos gnas kyis la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202b-19: khyim ni legs par bsrung gyis shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202b-21: de ltar rgyal po gzhon nu des tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras pa na gling chen po bzhi po de dag nas khang khyim na gnas pa la sems dga' ba'i sems can ni gcig kyang byung bar ma gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202b-22: thams cad rab tu byung ba'i sems dang ldan zhing rab tu 'byung ba la gzhol ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202b-23: mngon par byung ba'i bsam pa dang bcas te gnas par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:202b-25: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs des sems can de dag thams cad kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:203a-1: bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi grong dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:203a-5: rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa dag sprul pa mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:203a-7: de nas gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:203a-8: sems can gcig kyang khyim na gnas par ma gyur to /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:203a-9: de dag thams cad dad pas khyim nas khyim med par legs pa kho nar rab tu byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:203a-10: de ltar rab tu byung ba de dag la ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras s'a lu'i 'bru dag kyang byung bar 'gyur; dpag bsam gyi shing dag las dpag bsam gyi ras bcos bu gos rin po che dag kyang byung bar gyur cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:203a-11: lha rnams kyang de dag gi g-yog dang bsnyen bkur byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:203a-14: chos bzang de gnyis de ltar rab tu byung nas kyang brtson 'grus brtsams shing gnas par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:203a-15: de gnyis lo bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa gsum gyi bar du nam yang rmugs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:203a-16: gnyid kyis kun nas non par ma gyur cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:203a-17: nam yang zas za ba ma gtogs par 'dug par ma gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:203a-18: 'gro ba dang ldog pa kun du yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems bskyed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:203a-19: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de la yang rlom sems byed par ma gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:203a-20: lo bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa gsum po de dag la kun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:203b-0: rdo rje'i gnas dang ldan pa @203b zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang bsgrubs par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:203b-1: de gnyis sa'i phyogs gang dang gang du 'dug pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:203b-2: skyil mo krung bcas par gyur ba'i sa'i phyogs de dang de dag thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin du kun du gnas par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:203b-3: phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gis chos ston pa rnams kyang thos shing bzung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:203b-4: de ltar thos shing bzung nas kyang gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par bstan par yang gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:203b-6: gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag las nyan thos kyi theg pa bar gyur ba'i sems can gang dag yin pa de dag las sems can gcig 'ga' tsam yang so so'i skye bor gyur bzhin 'chi ba'i dus byas par ma gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:203b-7: gang dag thams cad kyi nang na le lo can du gyur pa de dag kyang phyir mi 'ong bar gyur cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:203b-8: de dag de nas shi 'phos nas kyang gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:203b-9: gang dag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bar gyur pa de dag ni de nas shi 'phos nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:203b-10: sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa sangs rgyas 'byung ba med pa gzhan dag tu skyes par gyur cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:203b-11: der yang de dag phyug po'i khyim chen po dag tu skyes par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:203b-12: der skyes nas kyang dbang po 'phel ba dang yongs su smin pa dag kyang rjes su thob nas sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis yang dag par bskul te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204a-0: thams cad dad pas khyim nas khyim @204a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204a-1: med par legs pa kho nar rab tu byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204a-2: de dag de ltar rab tu byung nas kyang zhag bdun 'das nas thams cad kyis rang byang chub rjes su thob ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204a-3: de dag gis kyang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag gi don byas nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204a-4: gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa par gyur pa de dag gis ni mngon par shes pa lnga dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204a-5: tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi bsgrubs shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204a-6: mi 'phrogs pa'i spobs pa nyid kyang thob par gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204a-7: gzungs kyang thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204a-9: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po mu khyud ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod yid gnyis sam the tshom za bar gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204a-10: 'od srung khyod kyis de ltar mi lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204a-11: nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na gling bzhi'i dbang phyug rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba der gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204a-12: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa ni rgyal bu gzhon nu thu bor gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204a-14: byang chub sems dpa' blo gros bzang po zhes bya bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204a-16: de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u chos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204a-17: chos bzang zhes bya bar gyur pa de gnyis gzhan dag cig yin snyam du khyod de snyam sems na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204a-18: 'od srung khyod kyis de ltar mi lta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204b-0: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u chos zhes bya bar @204b gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204b-1: khye'u chos bzang zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i snying po yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204b-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de sems can dag pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams kyi gnas su gyur cing ji tsam du mdzes par gyur pa la ltos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204b-4: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204b-5: bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de ni sku tshe'i tshad yun ji srid cig tu gyur lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog sna tshogs de ni bskal pa brgyad kyi bar du bzhugs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204b-13: dam pa'i chos ni bskal pa gcig gi bar du gnas par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204b-14: de'i sku gdung rnams kyang rgyas par gyur cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204b-15: de dag lha rnams kho nas mchod par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204b-16: de na mi khyim par gnas pa ni 'ga' yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204b-19: chos bzang gnyis bya ba nyung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204b-20: bdag gi don la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson par gnas shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204b-21: bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung rnams la yang mchod par mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:204b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mchod rten gyi drung du yang mi 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205a-2: dge slong las dang po pa gang dag yin pa de dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205a-4: chos bzang gnyis la 'di gnyis ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la mchod pa yang mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la bskor ba yang mi byed pa las na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205a-8: ma gus ba yin no zhes kha zer bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205a-10: de nas dge slong chos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205a-11: chos bzang gnyis kyis dge slong dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205a-12: lha 'bum phrag mang po 'dus par gyur pa'i dge slong gi 'khor dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205a-13: lha'i 'khor mang po de dag la smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205a-16: ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205a-17: rgyu gang gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung sems pa mi mnga' ba rnams kyis mchod pa brnyes par 'gyur snyam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205a-18: dge slong dang lha de dag gis smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205a-19: sku gdung 'di dag ni tshul khrims dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205a-23: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas rab tu phye ba yin pas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205a-24: de'i phyir 'di dag ni mchod par 'os pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205a-26: chos bzang gnyis kyis 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205a-32: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dag nyid mchod pa'i 'os pa yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205b-0: sku gdung dag ni @205b mchod par 'os par mi 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205b-2: lha de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205b-4: ji skad smras pa bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205b-6: chos bzang gnyis kyis smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205b-8: 'o na tshul khrims kyi mtshan nyid ni gang yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205b-12: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dag gi mtshan nyid kyang gang yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205b-14: lha de dag gis smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205b-15: tshul khrims ni mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205b-19: rnam par grol pa'i ye shes mthong ba dag kyang mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205b-21: de nas dge slong chos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205b-22: chos bzang gnyis kyis dge slong dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205b-23: lha de dag la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205b-25: 'o na mngon par 'du byed pas mngon par 'du byed pa med pa mchod par nus sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205b-27: lha de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205b-30: chos bzang gnyis kyis 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205b-32: de lta bas na khyed kyang bdag tu mngon par 'du ma byed cig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205b-33: des ni mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:205b-34: sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa la ni sangs rgyas mthong ba yang med na mchod pa'i las lta smos kyang ci dgos te de ni gnas med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206a-0: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par 'dod @206a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206a-4: lha de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206a-5: ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par 'dod pas bdag nyid mchod par bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206a-7: chos bzang gnyis kyis smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206a-9: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mchod pa gang gis bdag nyid sems can thams cad kyi mchod pa'i gnas su 'os par mchod pa de ltar bdag nyid mchod par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206a-10: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bslabs pa de ltar bslab par bya zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206a-11: bslabs pas rlom sems su yang mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206a-12: chos rab tu dbye bar bya zhing rab tu phye nas kyang chos 'ga' yang bsam par mi bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206a-13: gang gi tshe khyed cag de ltar bdag nyid mchod par byed pa de'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa yang mchod par 'gyur ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206a-14: khyed cag nyid kyang mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la mchod par 'dod pas ni bdag nyid mchod par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206a-16: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bdag nyid mchod par mdzad pa de ltar mchod pa bya zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yon tan gang dag dang ldan pas mchod pa rnyed par gyur pa'i yon tan de dag bdag nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206a-18: de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206b-0: gang 'du shes dang @206b mtshan ma bskyed par mi byed pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206b-1: gang bdag tu rtog par mi byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206b-2: rnam par rtog par mi byed pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206b-3: gang 'jig rten pha rol du mi 'gro ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206b-5: gang tshu rol la yang mi gnas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206b-6: pha rol la yang mi gnas pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206b-7: gang la chad pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206b-9: gang la 'dzin pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206b-10: spong ba med pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206b-11: gang la 'bri ba med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206b-13: gang la skye ba med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206b-15: gang la zad pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206b-16: mi zad pa med pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206b-17: gang la sems med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206b-18: sems las byung ba'i chos rnams med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206b-19: yid la byed pa rnams med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206b-21: yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206b-28: gnyis su med par 'jug pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206b-29: gang la 'dus byas med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206b-31: bgrang du med pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206b-32: gang la lus dang ngag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:206b-33: yid kyi mngon par 'du byed pa'i bya ba med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:207a-0: lus dang ngag dang yid mi dmigs pa de ni de bzhin @207a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:207a-1: gshegs pa mchod pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:207a-2: gang la 'das pa'i 'du shes mi 'jug pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:207a-4: ma 'ong ba'i 'du shes mi 'jug pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:207a-5: gang rten par mi byed pa dang; mngon par zhen par mi byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:207a-6: mtshan mar mi byed pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:207a-7: sangs rgyas su 'du shes mi 'jug pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:207a-12: gzhan du ma yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yin no ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:207a-13: bam po bzhi pa ste tha ma /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:207a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni mi skye ba'i mtshan nyid yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:207a-16: de ni skye bas mchod par sla ba ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:207a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas de ni mngon par 'du byed pas mchod par sla ba ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:207a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:207a-21: de ni gnyis kyis mchod par sla ba ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:207a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni zag pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas de ni zag pa med pa mngon par 'du bya bas mchod par sla ba ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:207a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsgos pa yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:207a-26: de ni bdag tu lta ba'am //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:207b-6: 'jig par lta bas mchod par sla ba ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:207b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:207b-9: de ni mtshan ma'i spyod yul gyis mchod par sla ba ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:207b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:207b-12: de ni smon pa la gnas pas mchod par sla ba ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:207b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:207b-15: de ni dngos po'i 'du shes la gnas pas mchod par sla ba ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:207b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni g-yo ba med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:207b-18: de ni g-yo zhing 'gul ba'i blo rnams kyis mchod par sla ba ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:207b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:207b-21: de ni 'dus byas la gnas pas mchod par sla ba ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:207b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:207b-24: de ni 'dod chags spyod pas mchod par sla ba ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:207b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni zhe sdang dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:207b-27: de ni gnod sems dang tha ba'i nyes pa la gnas pas mchod par sla ba ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208a-1: ni gti mug dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208a-2: de ni shes rab 'chal ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208a-4: mi shes pa rnams kyis mchod par sla ba ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni tshul khrims dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208a-10: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas yongs su bsgos pa yin pas; de ni tshul khrims 'chal ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208a-13: rnam par ma grol ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208a-14: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ma yin pa rnams kyis mchod par sla ba ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni byams pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208a-19: btang snyoms kyis yongs su bsgos pa yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208a-20: de ni gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208a-22: dga' ba'i sems med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208a-23: rnam par g-yeng ba'i sems yid la byed pa rnams kyis mchod par sla ba ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni sbyin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208a-30: shes rab kyis yongs su bsgos pa yin pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208a-31: de ni ser sna can dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208a-35: khong khro ba mang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208b-0: shes rab 'chal ba rnams kyis mchod @208b par sla ba ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208b-2: de ltar dge slong chos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208b-3: chos bzang gnyis kyis 'khor de dag la de lta de ltar chos bstan pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208b-4: 'khor de las byang chub sems dpar bzhi khri nyis stong gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208b-5: srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gis ni shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208b-7: 'dod chags dang bral ba nyid dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208b-8: phyir mi 'ong ba nyid kyang rjes su thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208b-9: sngon sems ma bskyed pa'i srog chags nyi khri sum stong gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208b-12: chos bzang gnyis kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa de lta bu dang ldan par gyur pa la ltos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208b-14: skyes bu dam pa de lta bu dag gis zab mo la bzod pa de dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208b-15: thabs la mkhas pa de la bslab par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208b-17: de ltar skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis dge slong dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208b-18: lha de dag zab mo'i bzod pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208b-19: de phyin chad de dag thams cad bdag gi don la sbyar ba'i rjes su brtson pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208b-20: bya ba nyung ngur gnas pas gnas par gyur cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208b-21: phyin chad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams kyi drung du'ang mi 'gro /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir brtson par yang mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:208b-24: 'di ltar de dag gi sems chos zab mo bla na med pa yang dag pa nyid la zhugs par gyur pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:209a-1: srung; de nas zhag bdun 'das nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag thams cad kyang sa la nub par gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:209a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag thams cad kyang sprog mar blugs pa bzhin nam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:209a-3: snod du blugs pa bzhin du de nyid du mi snang bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:209a-5: de lta bas na skyes bu dam pa de dag gi rjes su bslab par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:209a-6: 'od srung; yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:209a-7: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i dge slong lus ma bsgoms pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:209a-10: shes rab ma bsgoms pa kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:209a-11: de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gi mchod pas 'tsho bar sems kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:209a-12: mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir ma yin zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:209a-13: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir ni ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:209a-14: de dag ni bdag nyid tshul khrims 'chal ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:209a-17: rnam par ma grol ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:209a-18: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ma yin bzhin du 'tsho ba tsam gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung tshul khrims dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:209a-22: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas yongs su bsgos pa dag la bkur sti bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:209a-24: mchod par bya bar sems so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:209a-25: de dag ni bdag nyid 'dod chags dang bcas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:209b-0: zhe sdang dang @209b bcas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:209b-1: gti mug dang bcas pa yin bzhin du 'tsho ba tsam gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'dod chags dang bral ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:209b-3: gti mug dang bral ba'i sku gdung dag la bkur sti bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:209b-5: mchod par bya bar sems so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:209b-6: de dag ni bdag nyid ser sna can dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:209b-9: tha ba'i nyes pa mang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:209b-10: le lo dang ldan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:209b-12: shes bzhin med pa yin bzhin du 'tsho btsam gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin bdag chen po yang dag pa'i gnas la rab tu gnas pa mnyam par gzhag pa thugs rtse gcig pa'i sku gdung dag la bkur sti bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:209b-14: mchod pa bya bar sems so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:209b-16: nga ni rigs kyi bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:209b-17: rigs kyi bu mo las dang po pa dag gi sems mngon par dad par bya ba'i phyir /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:209b-18: sku gdung rnams byin gyis rlob par mdzad de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:209b-19: gang dag de dag la mchod pa byed pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:209b-20: lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:209b-21: de yang de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar gyi rgyur 'gyur ba yin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:209b-22: mi blun po de dag ni bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung nas ngas dge sbyong gi las su gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni de dag gis bor zhing btang la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:209b-23: bdag nyid gso ba'i don dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210a-0: slong mo ster ba'i khyim dag yongs su smin par bya @210a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210a-2: lhung bzed dang chos gos yongs su btsal ba'i don dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210a-3: rnyed pa dang bkur sti mngon par bsgrub pa'i don dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210a-6: grags pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i don gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210a-7: mchod rten la mchod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210a-8: bsnyen bkur bya ba'i las kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210a-9: mchod rten dag la bkur sti nye bar sgrub par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210a-11: de la dge sbyong gi las gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210a-13: ngas las gnyis po bsam gtan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210a-14: kha ton bya ba bstan pa gang dag yin pa de dag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210a-15: las de gnyis kyang lam la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir bstan par zad kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210a-16: de dag kyang shin tu mthar thug pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210a-17: shin tu mthar phyin pa ni ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210a-19: las gang las zad par bya ba'i phyir 'jug pa de ni dge sbyong gi las yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210a-21: nyes pa mi byung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210a-22: log par mi byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210a-24: yid la byed pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210a-27: rnam par thar ba'i sgo gsum po dag mngon du byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210a-28: khams gsum du mtshams sbyor ba med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210a-30: 'ong ba med pa gang yin pa de ni dge sbyong gi las zhes bya ba yin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210a-31: mi blun po de dag ni dge sbyong gi las de lta bu de dag spangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210a-32: las gzhan dang gzhan dag yongs su tshol bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210b-0: de dag ni ngas khyim na gnas @210b pa gos dkar po can rnams kyis bslab par gsungs pa gang yin pa de tsam la yang slob par mi byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210b-1: khyim na gnas pa gos dkar po can rnams kyang re zhig de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa rnams slob pa byed pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210b-2: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur na mi blun po de dag ni bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung nas rnam par grol ba dang rjes su mthun pa tsam yang bsgom par mi byed na 'thob par lta ga la 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210b-5: yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma de la ming gis zil gyis non cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210b-7: rtags dang; dbyibs kyis dge slong du 'gyur gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210b-10: shes rab kyis ma yin pa dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210b-15: sman dag gis gos la 'debs shing bgo bar byed la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210b-16: gang gis gos de gyon pa na zhag bdun nam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210b-17: zhag brgyad kyis de'i lus me lce gcig tu gyur cing kun du 'bar bar byed pa la la zhig yod par gyur cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210b-18: des gos de gsang sngags dang sman dag gis btab cing yongs su bgos nas mi mdza' ba la la zhig la 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210b-19: mdza' bshes kyi tshul gyis ster bar gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:210b-20: de nas mi des kyang gos de mdzes pa yin par rig nas len par byed cing blangs nas gos de gyon par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:211a-0: de zhag bdun nam zhag brgyad kyi bar du ni gos de las dga' ba @211a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:211a-3: zhag brgyad 'das nas mi de khyim du song ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:211a-4: lam po cher song ba na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:211a-5: gos de rab tu 'bar bar gyur cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:211a-6: de nas mi de gzhi de las tshul ma yin pa'i sdug bsngal skyes par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:211a-11: gos de las ro myang ba ni ji tsam zhig yod /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:211a-12: nyes dmigs ni ji tsam zhig yod snyam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:211a-15: ro myang ba ni chung lags kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:211a-16: nyes dmigs ni dpag tu ma mchis lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:211a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:211a-19: de bzhin du nga'i gos ngur smrig tshul khrims dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:211a-23: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas bsgos pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang bskal pa bye ba grangs med pa nas legs par spyad pas yang dag par bsgrubs pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:211a-24: mi blun po dge sbyong ltar bcos pa de dag ni drang srong gi rgyal mtshan gyon nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:211a-29: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu 'jug par 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:211a-31: khyim bdag dad pa rnams kyis de dge sbyong yin no snyam nas bkur sti byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:211a-34: mchod par byed par 'gyur zhing de dag gos ngur smrig gi gzhi de las mchod pa rnyed par 'gyur bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:211b-0: de dag des dga' ba @211b nyams su myong bar yang 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:211b-1: de dag lus zhig nas ni sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:211b-2: de dag der lcags kyi glegs ma 'bar ba gyon par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:211b-3: lcags kyi thu lum za bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:211b-4: lcags kyi khu ba bskol ba 'thung bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:211b-5: mal stan rab tu 'bar ba dag gi steng na nyal bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:211b-7: de dag ni rang gi las des lus zhig nas sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar zad kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:211b-8: gzhi gang las mi blun po de dag gis kyang bde bar sbyar ba rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i gos ngur smrig gi dpal dang gzi brjid de 'dra ba la ltos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:211b-10: ngas kyang de la dgongs nas 'di skad ces lcags kyi glegs ma 'bar ba dag gyon pa ni sla'i /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:211b-11: tshul khrims 'chal bas gos ngur smrig bgo ba ni de lta ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:211b-12: lcags kyi thu lum dag bza' ba ni sla'i /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:211b-13: tshul khrims 'chal bas bsod snyoms dag la yongs su longs spyod pa ni de lta ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:211b-16: de la ro myang ba ci tsam yod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:211b-17: de la nyes dmigs ji tsam yod pa la ltos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:211b-19: de lta bas na ci nas kyang tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:211b-20: sdig pa 'chags par 'gyur ba de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212a-0: mi'am mi ma yin pa sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa @212a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212a-1: rnams kyi sku gzugs bya bar nus snyam mam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212a-4: de ni de lta ma lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa ni zla ma mchis pa; sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags pas de'i slad du de dag gi sku gzugs bgyi ba ni sla ba ma lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212a-8: phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na lnga brgya tha ma la dge slong lus ma bsgoms pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212a-11: shes rab ma bsgoms pa kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212a-12: de dag ni ras bcos bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212a-14: ra ba dag gi ngos la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dag 'dri bar 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212a-15: de dag gis 'tsho bar sems par yang 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212a-16: las des bdag nyid rlom sems su byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212a-18: gzhan dag la brnyas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212a-20: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212a-21: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212a-23: 'o na bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gsal rgyal la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byas na bsod nams 'di tsam du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212a-24: zhes bka' stsal pa ma lags sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212b-0: rgyal po gsal rgyal ni khyim pa gos dkar po gyon pa yin pas des de bzhin gshegs @212b pa'i sku gzugs byed du bcug na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212b-1: de ni de la mchod pa byed par 'gyur bar zad kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212b-4: rnyed pa cung zad kyang 'dod par mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212b-6: mi blun po de dag ni gzhi des 'tsho bar 'gyur bar sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212b-7: de dag gis don bya'o snyam du sems la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212b-8: don med pa kho na byed pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212b-11: rigs kyi bu mo bsod nams 'dod pa kho na yin pa gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du bcug na ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212b-12: de dag la bsod nams dpag tu med pa bskyed par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212b-14: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa rnams kyi lus gzugs 'tshong pa yang legs pa ma yin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'tshong ba lta smos kyang ci dgos na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212b-16: mi blun po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du bcug nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212b-17: khyim pa'i lag tu 'tshong bar byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212b-18: des 'tsho bar sems par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212b-22: mi byis pa dang 'dra ba shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can la la zhig yod par gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212b-23: des bdud rtsi yongs su spangs nas dug za bar byed pa de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212b-25: mi blun po gang dag zang zing gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs byed du bcug nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212b-26: bdag nyid dug dang bcas par byed pa de dag kyang de lta bu yin pa snyam du nga sems so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:212b-28: legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la dug ces bya ba de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:213a-2: rnyed pa yin na de la mi blun po khro bas zil gyis non pa gcig la gcig 'thab pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:213a-4: mtshang 'dru bar byed pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:213a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya'o zhes zer zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:213a-6: bdag nyid sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:213a-10: mi thabs la mi mkhas pa la la zhig g-yul ngor zhugs pa na rang gi mtshon gyis rang la 'debs par byed pa de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:213a-12: mi blun po de dag kyang dam pa'i chos rnams kyis sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:213a-14: rigs kyi bu bu'am; rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs rin po che sna bdun las byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:213a-15: shin tu zin par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:213a-16: byi dor legs par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:213a-17: chu zheng du ri rab tsam yod pa byed du bcug ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:213a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de lta bu dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:213a-21: bu ram shing gi tshal lam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:213a-22: 'dam bu'i tshal lam; 'bras kyi zhing ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:213a-23: til gyi zhing ltar 'dab chags su yongs su bkang bar gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:213a-27: rigs kyi bu mo de gzhi de las bsod nams mang po bskyed par 'gyur snyam mam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:213b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs sor mo'i phyogs tsam zhig bgyid du stsal na yang bsod @213b nams mang du bskyed lags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:213b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs ri rab tsam du bgyid du stsal pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:213b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:213b-4: khyod kyi khong du chud par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:213b-5: de bas kyang byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la rab tu rtog par byed pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:213b-6: tha na se gol gtogs pa tsam zhig chos zab mo rnams la bzod pa thob par gyur na de ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:213b-7: de bas kyang gang zhig tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:213b-8: tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig bzung nas tshigs su bcad pa de'i don gang yin pa de yang rtog par byed la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:213b-9: sems can gcig tsam la ston par yang byed na de ches bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:213b-11: de la ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la rab tu brtag par bya zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:213b-13: 'di la byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po'i rjes su bslab par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:213b-15: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:213b-17: ches shin tu grangs med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:213b-18: rgya che ba tshad med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:213b-20: dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:213b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar 'od ces bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:213b-22: rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:214a-2: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:214a-3: bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shig 'jig rten du byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:214a-4: 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa skar 'od de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po zhes bya ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:214a-6: mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhig bram ze'i rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu zhig gi bur skyes par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:214a-8: de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la dge slong gang dag rab tu byung bar gyur pa de dag las bya ba sna tshogs kyis sbags pas sbags pa ni phal che'i /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:214a-9: yang dag par zhugs pa ni nyung bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:214a-11: dge slong de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs byed du 'jug cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:214a-14: khang pa'i rtsig ngos dag la ri mo 'drir 'jug par yang byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:214a-15: de'i tshe na dge slong zhig gis dar la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs legs par byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:214a-16: shin tu zin par byas pa zhig bris nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:214a-17: byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po'i pha'i rgyal po'i pho brang du khyer ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:214a-19: de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po des /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:214a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de mthong nas 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di yang 'di tsam du blta na sdug pa yin no /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:214b-0: de bzhin @214b gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:214b-1: bdag kyang lus 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur na ci ma rung snyam nas dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:214b-3: dad pa skyes par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:214b-4: de de'i tshe na khyim thams cad la mngon par mi dga' bar gyur cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:214b-5: de 'di snyam du khyim gyi gnas na gnas pas lus 'di lta bu bsgrub par mi nus pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:214b-6: de'i phyir bdag mngon par 'byung bar bya'o snyam du sems par yang gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:214b-8: de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po skyes nas lo bcu drug lon la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:214b-9: dbang po rnams rgyas shing yongs su smin pa yang rjes su thob nas rang gi pha ma ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:214b-10: rang gi pha ma gnyis kyi rkang pa dag la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:214b-12: bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la khyim nas khyim ma mchis par legs par legs pa kho nar rab tu 'byung bar ci gnang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:214b-14: gzhon nu khyod de skad ma zer cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:214b-16: ded gnyis la bu gcig pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:214b-18: phangs pa yid du 'ong ba khyod las med pas gal te khyod ma mthong na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:214b-19: 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:214b-21: bdag gis khyed gnyis kyang nongs par mi 'gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:214b-22: bdag kyang mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:215a-0: @215a *// bdag deng slan chad ji srid du mngon par byung bar ma gyur pa de srid du 'tshal ma yang mi 'tshal /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:215a-5: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i tshig 'ga' yang mi smra lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:215a-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po des /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:215a-8: sa phyogs byi dor ma byas pa zhig tu 'dug ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:215a-9: cang mi smra bar gyur cing nyin gcig zan yang ma zos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:215a-10: de nas de'i pha ma gnyis kyis ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas thogs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:215a-11: gzhan tshig tu ma brjod cing nyin mtshan thog thag tu de la gsol ba btab kyang de tshig tsam yang mi smra bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:215a-13: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de cang mi smra bar zhag gnyis kyi bar du zan ma zos pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:215a-14: de nas ma'i nye du lnga brgya tsam dag gis ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas thogs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:215a-15: gzhan ni tshig tu mi brjod cing nyin mtshan thog thag tu gsol ba btab kyang; de dag gi gdong du yang mi lta na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:215a-16: tshig smra ba lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:215a-18: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de cang mi smra bar zhag gsum gyi bar du zan ma zos pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:215a-19: de nas pha'i nye du lnga brgya tsam dag gis ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas thogs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:215a-20: gzhan tshig tu mi brjod cing nyin mtshan thog thag tu gsol ba btab kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:215b-0: de dag gi gdong @215b du yang mi lta /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:215b-3: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de cang mi smra bar zhag bzhi'i bar du zan ma zos pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:215b-4: de nas de'i ne'u ldangs lnga brgya dag gis ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas thogs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:215b-5: gzhan tshig tu ma brjod cing nyin mtshan thog thag tu gsol ba btab kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:215b-6: de dag gi gdong du yang mi lta na tshig smra ba lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:215b-8: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de cang mi smra bar zhag lnga'i bar du zan ma zos pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:215b-9: de nas de'i pha ma gnyis kyis rgyal po'i pho brang na 'gron bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:215b-18: gzhan yang rin po che dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:215b-20: rgyan sna tshogs ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad phyogs gcig tu bzhag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:215b-21: na chung lha'i bu mo 'dra ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong yang bkug ste phyogs gcig tu bkod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:215b-23: mdor na rgyal po'i pho brang de na nye bar spyod pa'i longs spyod ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad de'i mdun du bzhag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:215b-24: de'i pha ma gnyis kyis ma'i nye du lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:215b-25: pha'i nye du lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:215b-26: ne'u ldangs lnga brgya tsam bo de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:215b-27: na chung brgyad khri bzhi stong po dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216a-0: skye bo phal po che de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de'i mdun du bkod @216a *//
