K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216a-1: nas; ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas thogs te gzhan tshig tu ma brjod cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216a-2: nyin mtshan thog thag tu gsol ba 'debs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216a-3: de la 'di skad ces gzhon nu longs la zan zo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216a-4: khyim 'dir 'dug la sbyin pa dag kyang byin cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216a-5: bsod nams dag kyang gyis shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216a-6: bud med 'di dag dang lhan cig tu dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216a-8: dga' mgur spyad pa dag kyang gyis la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216a-9: rgyal po'i khyim 'di lta bu yongs su ma btang zhig ces kyang smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216a-11: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de skye bo phal po che de ltar 'dus pa de dag la mig kyang mi lta /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216a-12: phyir yang mi smra bar de bzhin du cang mi zer bar 'dug cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216a-13: zhag drug gi bar du zan yang ma zos par de sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang 'brel ba'i yid la byed pa ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan thams cad dang bral zhing kha zas kyi 'du shes kyang mi bskyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216a-15: de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de'i pha ma de gnyis dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216a-16: skye bo phal po che de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216a-18: nye du'i tshogs chen po de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216a-19: bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag thams cad kyis bzhin la mchi ma'i rgyun blags shing skad phyung ste dud mos btab nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216a-20: byang chub sems dpa' de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216a-21: de de dag gi gdong du yang mi lta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216b-0: de nas rgyal po'i pho brang de na @216b lha zhig gnas par gyur pa gang yin pa de steng gi bar snang la cho 'phrul chen pos 'dug nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216b-1: skye bo phal po che de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216b-2: gang dag byang chub phyir brtson pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216b-3: de dag lhun po 'dra bar ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216b-4: mthu brtan rab tu mi g-yo ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216b-5: yid dam gtong bar mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216b-6: sa rnams thams cad g-yo yang srid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216b-7: me ni chur yang 'gyur srid kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216b-8: grogs dag 'di ni gnas 'di las; ;bskyod par nus pa ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216b-9: 'di la mi dga' phyis mi bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216b-10: sdig pa'i las rnams ma byed cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216b-11: phyin chad dmus long 'dra bar ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216b-12: bskal pa bye bar 'khyams sa re //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216b-13: 'di ni sems can thams cad la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216b-14: phan phyir byang chub zhugs pa ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216b-15: mngon par byang chub brtson rnams ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216b-16: byang chub dam pa rnyed mi dka'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216b-17: 'dod pa'i phyir dang longs spyod phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216b-18: byang chub spyad pa mi spyod kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216b-19: sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216b-20: ye shes tshol rnams ji ltar bde //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216b-21: stong gsum rin chen rnams dang ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216b-22: gos dang yul gzhan lha rdzas kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216b-23: chal bar bkang bar gyur kyang ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216b-24: de dag chags par bya mi nus //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216b-25: mi shes pas ni gang byas pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216b-26: sdig pa'i las ni bshags par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216b-27: mkhas pa nyes pa bshags nas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216b-28: las dang lhan cig mi gnas so; ;'od srung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216b-29: de ltar lha des bskul na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:216b-30: byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de'i pha ma de gnyis dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:217a-1: dang; skye bo phal po che dag gis nyes pa la nyes par bshags nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:217a-2: gzhon nu de la 'di skad ces smras te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:217a-3: gzhon nu khyod ji ltar bsam pa bzhin song zhig ;rab tu yang byung zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:217a-5: zas ma zos pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur ta re zhes byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:217a-7: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po des zhag bdun gyi bar du zan bcad du zin kyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:217a-9: sangs rgyas dang 'brel pa yid la byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:217a-10: zhag bdun gyi bar du lha rnams kyis de'i lus la mdangs bcug pas na dbang po rnams gzhan du gyur par yang ma gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:217a-11: bzhin gyi mdangs yongs su nyams par yang ma gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:217a-13: byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po des /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:217a-14: de ltar zhag bdun gyi bar du zan bcad de khyim gyi gnas la mi lta zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:217a-15: rgyal srid chen po de mchil ma'i thal ba bzhin du bor nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:217a-16: bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong po da dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:217a-18: nye du'i tshogs de dag gdong mchi mas gang ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:217a-19: ngu bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de khyer te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:217a-20: rang gi grong khyer chen po nas byung nas dgon pa mi med pa gcan zan gdug pa gnas pa'i nags shig tu bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:217a-21: de der bzhugs nas ras bcos bu'i gzhi gang la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de bris pa'i ras bcos bu'i gzhi de bres nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:217b-0: ras @217b bcos bu'i gzhi de nyid kyi mdun du rtsva'i gding ba bting ba'i steng du skyil mo krung bcas nas lus drang por bsrang ste 'dug nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:217b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de la rtog par byed do; ;de de la rtog par byed pa na 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:217b-2: gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di yang 'di tsam du mdzes pa yin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:217b-4: de lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:217b-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de de tsam du mdzes pa ni ngo mtshar bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:217b-6: gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba de dag ni dpal yon can yin no snyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:217b-7: de 'di snyam du ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa blta bar bya snyam du yang sems par yang gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:217b-8: de nas nags khrod de na lha zhig gnas par gyur pa gang yin pa des byang chub sems dpa' de'i sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:217b-9: byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:217b-10: grogs po khyod ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa blta bar bya snyam du rnam par rtog par byed pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di ji lta ba de bzhin du blta bar bya zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:217b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang blta bar bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:217b-12: de ltar mthong na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:217b-13: de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218a-1: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di la ji ltar blta bar bya snyam nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218a-3: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di sems par mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218a-4: rnam par shes par mi byed pa de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218a-5: chos thams cad kyang sems par mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218a-6: rnam par shes par mi byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218a-8: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di ming du btags pa tsam du zad pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang ming du btags pa tsam du zad la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218a-9: ming de yang ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218a-10: rang bzhin gyis g-yo ba med pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218a-12: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di la thob pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218a-13: mngon par rtogs pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218a-15: mngon sum du bya ba med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218a-17: 'bras bu rtogs pa med pa dang; gnas med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218a-23: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218a-24: rnam par byang ba med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218a-27: tshul ma yin pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218a-28: 'dod chags zad pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218a-29: zhe sdang zad pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218a-30: gti mug zad pa med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218a-31: phung po rnams med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218b-1: skye mched rnams med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218b-2: sngon gyi mtha' med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218b-3: phyi ma'i mtha' med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218b-4: dbus med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218b-6: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di g-yo ba med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218b-7: spyod pa med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu kho na yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218b-9: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di lta bar mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218b-19: rnam par shes par mi byed pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218b-20: chos thams cad ji lta ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218b-21: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa yang ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218b-22: gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa yang ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218b-23: gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa yang ma yin pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:218b-25: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di la tshu rol yang med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:219a-9: byed pa yang med; ltung ba yang med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:219a-12: bden pa mngon par shes pa yang med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:219a-13: kun du 'dod chags chags pa yang med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:219a-16: mya ngan las 'das pa yang med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:219a-17: chos thams cad ji lta ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu yin no snyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:219a-19: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la 'jug pa de lta bu des rab tu rtog par byed pa na nyin mtshan du skyil mo krung zhig par ma gyur cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:219a-20: des nyin mtshan de la mngon par shes pa lnga dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:219a-21: tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:219a-22: spobs pa thogs pa med pa dag kyang bsgrubs par gyur nas ting nge 'dzin kun du snang ba zhes bya ba yang bsgrubs par gyur nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:219a-23: de la snang ba yang byung bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:219a-24: snang ba byung bar gyur pa des lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las shin tu 'das pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:219a-25: grangs med pa dag kyang mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:219a-26: lha'i rna ba sgrib pa med pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos bstan pa thams cad kyang thos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:219b-0: de bzhin gshegs @219b pa gcig gis chos bstan pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis pas chos bstan pa la sgrib par ma gyur cig thams cad kyang mnyes par byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:219b-2: byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po zla ba bdun gyi bar du 'chag cing 'dug par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:219b-3: shes pa'i zas ma gtogs par zas gzhan yang mi za zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:219b-4: lha rnams kyis de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rig nas de'i lus la mdangs bcug par yang gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:219b-6: byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po des gos dur smrig dag kyang ma bgos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:219b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa yang mngon sum du ma mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:219b-8: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang ma blangs mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:219b-9: 'on kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rjes su thob cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:219b-10: de ltar bslab par 'dod par gyur pa la ltos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:219b-12: byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rab tu rnam par 'byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:219b-13: ci nas kyang 'phel bar mi byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:219b-14: 'bri bar mi byed pa de ltar rab tu rnam par 'byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:219b-17: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus chen po des de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de la bsnyen bkur byas pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la bsnyen bkur bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:219b-18: des de ltar bsnyen bkur byas shing yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog par byed pa na ye shes chen po'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dag kyang skyed par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:220a-1: des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag kyang mthong bar gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:220a-2: de dag chos ston pa dag kyang thos par gyur to; ;'od srung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:220a-3: de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po de nags khrod de nas phyir byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:220a-8: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu zhugs nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:220a-9: sems can rnams la chos ston par byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:220a-10: des srog chags nyi khri ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems la bkod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:220a-11: sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag ni nyan thos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:220a-12: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i bsod nams dag la bkod par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:220a-15: 'khor gzhan thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:220a-17: de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod nem nur dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:220a-19: the tshom za bar gyur na khyod kyis de ltar mi lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:220a-21: nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po zhes bya ba der gyur pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:220a-23: de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:220b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' @220b chen po brtson 'grus chen po de dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:220b-1: de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyi rjes su bslab par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:220b-3: yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:220b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo thabs la mi mkhas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:220b-6: 'dod pas zil gyis non pa kha cig 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:220b-7: de dag ni ras bcos bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:220b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs gzhan dag la mchod pa byas pas dngos grub dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:220b-11: de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed pa yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:220b-12: gzhan dag ni mchod pa byed pa ma yin no snyam du rlom sems su 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:220b-13: de dag dge ba cung zad tsam po des bdag la bstod par byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:220b-14: gzhan la smod par byed cing gzhi des 'tsho bar sems par yang 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:220b-16: de'i tshe na gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du bcug pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:220b-18: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag ma gtogs par de ltar lung mnod pa yongs su tshol bar mi 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:220b-21: nang du yang dag 'jog la gces par sems par mi 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:220b-22: de dag de'i tshe na khyim pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:221a-4: shin tu yongs su shes par yang 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:221a-5: gzhi des de dag gi chos gos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:221a-10: yo byad dag kyang rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:221a-12: ngas ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyi las su 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:221a-13: tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:221a-14: mang du thos pa yongs su btsal bar bya'o zhes bstan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:221a-15: de dag ni de'i tshe na tshul khrims 'chal pa kho nar gnas shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:221a-16: chos yongs su btsal pa spangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir brtson par 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:221a-17: gzhi des 'tsho bar sems pa la ltos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:221a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:221a-20: ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag gi sgyu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:221a-22: gya gyu de dag mang du bka' stsal pa ni ngo mtshar lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:221a-26: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa dag gis mdo sde 'di lta bu thos nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:221a-27: su zhig tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su sbyong bar mi bgyid lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:221b-0: slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus @221b na rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:221b-1: bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:221b-3: de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs pas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:221b-4: bdag cag yul 'di lta bu la spyod pa las phyir ldog par bya'o zhes kun du skyo ba skye bar 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:221b-5: rab tu spyod par 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi rnams grangs 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:221b-6: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:221b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:221b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa gnas rnam pa 'di lta bu gang ci ston pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:221b-10: yang dag par ston par mdzad pa de dag thams cad ni rigs kyi bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:221b-11: rigs kyi bu mo de dag nyid kyi ched du ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:221b-12: 'di ltar de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:221b-13: thos nas kyang skyon de dag yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:221b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:221b-15: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:221b-16: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:221b-17: byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:221b-22: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:221b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:222a-1: pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:222a-2: 'phags pa byams pa seng ge'i sgra chen po'i le'u zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:222a-3: nyi shu gsum pa rdzogs so ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:222a-4: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-039-005:222a-7: zhu chen gyi lotstsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa //
